K01n742u_001:2103: tena hi na kṣamati yāvac chikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ |
K01n742u_001:2106: aparā dāni bhikṣunī prāsādikā darśanīyā taruṇī ucchvāsakārī vā praśvāsa-kāri vā mārgāto utkramitvā upaviṣṭā |
K01n742u_001:2110: āryā prāsādikā darśanīyā taruṇī pratyagra-yauvane vartasi |
K01n742u_001:2117: āhaṃsuḥ | ācakṣva tāvat yāvat te tad anantaraṃ parivāriya dhārenti |
K01n742u_001:2128: tāye dāni kaukṛtyaṃ [kṛtaṃ] kaukṛtyena mahāprajāpatīye ārocayati |
K01n742u_001:2132: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati |
K01n742u_001:2135: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīya vinā adhvāna-mārgaṃ pratipadyeya antamasato grāmāntaram pi anyatra-samaye tatrāyaṃ samayo akāmikā bhikṣuṇī bhavati glānikā vā |
K01n742u_001:2143: akāmikā ti hasti- kaḍevareṇa aśva-kaḍevareṇa go-kaḍevareṇa vā manuṣya-kaḍevareṇa vā āvṛtā bhavati |
K01n742u_001:2144: glāniketi jarā-durbalā vā vyādhi-durbalā vā bhavati |
K01n742u_001:2147: etā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo adhvāna-mārgaṅ gacchanti yāvatā anto-sīmāṅ gacchanti kiñcāpi dūraṃ dūraṃ gacchanti anāpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:2148: atha dāni grāmāntaram vā nagarāntaram vā gacchanti kāntāra-mārgam vā atikrāmanti |
K01n742u_001:2152: adhyardham vā dvi-hastam vā gacchanti thūl'-accayam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:2153: atha dāni ekā bhikṣunī āgatvā sīmāntare tiṣṭhati thūl'-accayam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:2154: aparā āgatvā atikrāmati imaṃ sīmāntaran ti evaṃ yattikā atikrāmanti sarvāsāṃ thūl'-accayaṃ |
K01n742u_001:2156: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīya vinā adhvāna-mārgaṃ pratipadyeya antamasato grāmāntaram pi anyatra-samaye |
K01n742u_001:2164: tasya bhāryā śuklā nāma karmāra-dhītā prāsādikā darśanīyā |
K01n742u_001:2165: atha bhagavān kālasyaiva nivāsayitvā pātra-cīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya praviṣtaḥ |
K01n742u_001:2166: sāvadānam piṇḍāya caranto tasya gṛhaṃ gato uddeśe sthitaḥ |
K01n742u_001:2170: tasya dāni bhavati kin tāvad iyam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati |
K01n742u_001:2171: bhagavatā pi vaineya-vaśena prabhā te utsṛṣṭā |
K01n742u_001:2175: aye hi asti nāma tvaṃ mama bhagavantam āvārayasi |
K01n742u_001:2178: sā dān āha nāham ārya-putrasya an-artha-kāmā |
K01n742u_001:2180: api tu mā viprakṛto bhagavantam dṛṣṭvā utthāsyasīti |
K01n742u_001:2181: tāye dāni bhavati dhig astu mama gṛhāvāsasya |
K01n742u_001:2184: sā dān āha ārya-putra gacchāmy ahaṃ |
K01n742u_001:2193: tāya dāni aṣṭāhena pravrajitāya yuṃjantīya vyaṭayantīya vyāsayantīya tisro vidyāḥ ṣaḍ-abhijñāḥ |
K01n742u_001:2197: tāye dāni śakro 'mara-saṃgha-parivṛtto pāda-vando āgato | āha |
K01n742u_001:2218: apareṇa dāni upāsakena mahārheṇa paṭena chāditā |
K01n742u_001:2232: sā dāni gṛheṇa gṛhaṃ bhāṣaṇāya nīyati |
K01n742u_001:2237: tato 'syāḥ sarvo janakāyo śrotavyaṃ śraddhātavyam manyati |
K01n742u_001:2241: satyaṃ śukle evaṃ nāma tvayā jambhanaṃ śā(sā)dhitaṃ |
K01n742u_001:2249: 146. bhūta-pūrvam atīte 'dhvānaṃ nagare vārāṇasīyaṃ bhagavati kāśyape tatra dāni rājā kṛkī nāmābhūt |
K01n742u_001:2376: tāyo yānād avataritvāna sarvāḥ sapta kumāriyo
K01n742u_001:2428: ko vā tvaṃ kasya vā putraḥ
K01n742u_001:2495: 149.atha bhagavān tāsāṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ pūrve nivāsa-pratisaṃyuktāṃ pratijñā-kathāṃ vyākārṣīt |
K01n742u_001:2511: evaṃ hy etad bhagavan eṣāpi tatraivāsi |

K01n742u_001:2588: tena kālena tena samayena aparā hy etā bhikṣuṇīyo kṛkiṇo rājñaḥ sapta dhītaro abhūṣi |
K01n742u_001:2589: atha śuklā bhikṣuṇī gṛheṇa gṛhaṃ bhāṣaṇāya nīyati |
K01n742u_001:2590: sā dāni apareṇa gṛha-bhāṣaṇāya nītā bhikṣuṇīhi vipravustā |
K01n742u_001:2591: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhagavato ārocayati |
K01n742u_001:2598: evaṃ nāma tvaṃ bhikṣuṇībhir vinā vipravasasi |
K01n742u_001:2599: tena hi na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīhi vinā vipravasituṃ ekāṃ rātrim pi |
K01n742u_001:2604: tahin dāni aparā bhikṣuṇī jarā-durbalā vyādhi-durbalā sārthāt parihīṇā |
K01n742u_001:2608: yāvat mahāprajāpatī pi gautamī bhagavato ārocayati |
K01n742u_001:2617: na kasyacit praveśo dātavyo ti bhagavān prathamaṃ paribhokṣyati |
K01n742u_001:2619: atha rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kośalasya putro virūpa(ḍha)
K01n742u_001:2620: ko nāma kumāraḥ kapilavastuṃ gatako mātulānām antike śikṣāmāṇāya |
K01n742u_001:2621: so dāni tehi rakṣapālehi pramattehi saṃsthāgāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ krīḍanāya |
K01n742u_001:2622: so dāni tehi rakṣapālehi anyehi ca śākiyehi dṛṣṭo |
K01n742u_001:2623: te dāni ruṣitā iti-kitikāya putra dāsī-putra kahiṃ praviṣṭo 'si ti |
K01n742u_001:2625: ekena hastena bāhāyāṃ gṛhītvā dvitīyena hastena grīvāyāṃ saṃsthāgārād bahiś choritaḥ |
K01n742u_001:2627: taṃ dāni tehi śākiyehi saṃsthāgāra puruṣa-mātrā-bhūmiṃ khānāpayitvā navena pāṃsunā pūrayitvā gandhodakena siktaḥ |
K01n742u_001:2631: yady ahaṃ rājyaṃ pratilabheyaṃ śākiyānāṃ nidhanaṃ kariṣye |
K01n742u_001:2635: yadāhaṃ rājye pratiṣṭhito bhaveyaṃ tadā me smārayiṣyasi śākiyānām antam gamiṣyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:2637: kadāci dāni rājā prasenajit kośalo udyāna-bhūmin nirgataḥ |
K01n742u_001:2641: rājā prasenajit kośalo na bhūyaḥ praveśaṃ labhati |
K01n742u_001:2643: yasya bhavanto gṛheṇārthaḥ putra-dāreṇa cārthaḥ sa praviśatu nagaraṃ |
K01n742u_001:2644: evam akriyamāṇe yuṣmākaṃ putra-dāraṃ vyasanam āpādayiṣyāmīti |
K01n742u_001:2649: idānim vā paścād vā etasyaiva etaṃ rājyaṃ gacchatha |
K01n742u_001:2654: udyāna-bhūmīyaṃ saṃsthito pānīyapālo mallī ca rājā dṛṣṭa-satyo na paritasyati |
K01n742u_001:2657: yo dāni bhaṇe rājānaṃ kṣatriyaṃ jugupseya tasya kiṃ daṇḍaḥ |
K01n742u_001:2661: pūrvam ahaṃ kumāra-bhūtaḥ śākiyānāṃ saṃsthāgāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ tehi mama jugupsāya saṃsthāgāraṃ puruṣa-saṃsthāgāraṃ puruṣa-mātraṃ khānāpayitva pāṃsunā pūrayitvā kṣīra-gandhodakena bhittiyo tāyo [dhovitāyo? ]
K01n742u_001:2662: mayā teṣāṃ vairaṃ pratikartavyaṃ yadi bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ nānukampati |
K01n742u_001:2671: bhagavān dāni virūḍhakasya imam evaṃ rūpaṃ cetaḥ parivitarkam ājñāya kālasai(syai)
K01n742u_001:2676: atha khalu rājā virūḍhako catur-aṅga-bala-kāyaṃ sannāhayitvā hasti-kāyaṃ aśva-kāyaṃ ratha-kāyaṃ patti-kāyaṃ śrāvastyāṃ nagaryāṃ niryāti kapilavastuṃ nagaraṃ saṃprasthitaḥ |
K01n742u_001:2677: adrākṣīd rājā virūḍhako bhagavantaṃ śākhoṭaka-vṛkṣaṃ niśrāya niṣaṇṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca puna yena bhagavāṃs tena hasti-nāgaṃ prerayati |
K01n742u_001:2678: atha khalu rājā virūḍhako yāvad eva yānasya bhūmis tāvad yānena gatvā hasti-nāgāt pratyāruhya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantam etad avocat |
K01n742u_001:2680: aśvattha-nyagrodha-saptaparṇādyāḥ śobhanāś ca śītalāś ca tān utsṛjya itarasya pratyavarasya virala-patrasya śākhoṭaka-vṛkṣasyā-dhastān niṣaṇṇaḥ
K01n742u_001:2683: atha khalu rājño virūḍhakasya etad abhavat |
K01n742u_001:2685: tato yeva pratinivartayitvā śrāvastīn nagaram anupraviṣṭaḥ |
K01n742u_001:2686: bhagavān dāni śrāvastīyaṃ yathābhiramyaṃ viharitvā kapilavastuṃ nagaraṃ prakrāmi |
K01n742u_001:2692: rājā dāni virūḍhako śākīyān vadhitvā śākiya-kanyāyo ādāya śrāvastīṃ pratigataḥ tadyathā |
K01n742u_001:2699: so dāni sārdhaṃ krīḍanto ramanto paricārayantaḥ abhikṣṇaṃ vadati |
K01n742u_001:2704: atha khalv abhayā rāja-dhītā rājānaṃ virūḍhakam etad avocat |
K01n742u_001:2705: mā deva evaṃ vada nihatā me grāmakaṇṭakāḥ śākiyā iti |
K01n742u_001:2715: santi deva śākiyāḥ śrota-āpannāḥ sakṛd-āgāmino nāgāminas te devena a-dūṣakā an-aparā-dhino jīvitād vyavaropitāḥ |
K01n742u_001:2719: 154. atha rājā virūḍhakaḥ kupitaḥ yāvat kāraṇāntikaṃ mahāmātram āmantrayati |
K01n742u_001:2720: tvaṃ hi bhaṇe puruṣa mama bhogehi jāyayasi |
K01n742u_001:2727: tena hi bhaṇe mahā-mātra imāyo śākiyāyinīyo daṇḍa-hatāyo kṛtvā karṇanāsā-hasta-pāda-cchinnāyo kṛtvā taptena te[le]na kāyaṃ pariṣiñcitvā jīvantikāyo evaṃ parikhāyāṃ cchorayā |
K01n742u_001:2729: yan dāni ahaṃ śākiyāyinīnāṃ āsi darśanaṃ pi na labhamāno tāyo etāyo mama hasta-gatāyo yan nūnam aham etāhi saha krīḍeyaṃ rameyaṃ paricārayeyaṃ
K01n742u_001:2730: so dāni tāhi sārdhaṃ svake gṛhe pravicārayati |
K01n742u_001:2731: aśrauṣīd rājā virūḍhako kāraṇāntikas tāhi sārdhaṃ krīḍati yāvan na ca pi yathoktaṃ karotīti |
K01n742u_001:2737: tāyo tatra duḥkhaṃ tīvrāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti |
K01n742u_001:2745: atha khalu bhagavān kālasyaiva nivāsayitvā pātra-cīvaram ādāya śrāvastīn nagarīṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ |
K01n742u_001:2748: mahato jana-kāyasya nirghoṣo yāvad rājñā virūḍhakena ṣaṇṇāṃ śākiyāyinīnāṃ yāvat tasya kṛpaṇena yāvan sūkta-vādī bhagavān iti krandanti |
K01n742u_001:2749: sādhu bhagavān artha-kāmo jñātīnām anukampyārthaṃ upasaṃkrāmatu |
K01n742u_001:2750: apy eva nāma bhagavataḥ sammukhād dharmaṃ śruṇitvā api svargopigā bhaveṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:2751: 155. atha khalu bhagavāṃ śakraṃ devānām indraṃ samanvāharati sma |
K01n742u_001:2752: atha khalu śakro devānām indraḥ śacim āmantrayati |
K01n742u_001:2753: eṣa śaci bhagavān jñātīnām upasaṃkramati anukampārthaṃ |
K01n742u_001:2754: gaccha śaci tāyo śākiyāyinīyo [parikhāyā] uddharitvā saṃprajānaṃ niṣīdāpehi vastreṇācchādehi bhagavān upasaṃkramiṣyati |
K01n742u_001:2755: atha khalu śacī tāyo śākiyāyinīyo parikhāyā uddharitvā saṃprajānan niṣīdāpayitvā vastreṇācchāditā |
K01n742u_001:2756: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat tāyo-m-aindryā spharitvā yat kiñcit kāyikaṃ caitasikaṃ ca duḥkha-vedanā-gataṃ sarvaṃ taṃ pratiprasraṃbheti |
K01n742u_001:2758: tṛpyatāṃ bhikṣavo bhagavatīṣu ko bhikṣavo bhavam abhinandeya ko upādiyeya anyatra bāla-pṛthag-janā-nāṃ andhānāṃ acakṣukānāṃ paśyatha |
K01n742u_001:2759: bhikṣavaḥ etāyo śākiyāyinīyo manuṣyakehi pañcahi kāma-guṇehi krīḍitvā ramitvā pravicārayitvā etarhi jñāti-kṣaye ca bhoga-kṣaye ca karmasya ca sammukhī-bhāvād duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti |
K01n742u_001:2761: sacen manyatha bhaginīyo yad idaṃ yuṣmākaṃ hasto ca pādo ca chinno api tu te vedayanti vā na vā |
K01n742u_001:2764: evaṃ hy etad bhagavan sacen manyatha bhaginīyo cakṣuḥ sva-bhāvaṃ vedayati |
K01n742u_001:2765: yāvad asti ca tat-pratyayā duḥkhā vedanā |
K01n742u_001:2771: evaṃ ca punar duḥkhā vedanā parādhīnā para-pratibaddhā pratyayādhīnā pratyaya-pratibaddhā iti viditvā dvā -triṃśatīhi ākārehi prakṛti -bhinnaḥ
K01n742u_001:2773: ataś ca bhaginīyo ārya śrāvaka imāṃ (imesāṃ)
K01n742u_001:2777: yāvat tāyo paṭa śākiyāyinīyo dhītāṃ an-āgāmitāṃ sākṣāt kuryuḥ |
K01n742u_001:2778: pañcānāñ ca bhikṣu-śatānam anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimucyeyuḥ |
K01n742u_001:2779: anekeṣāñ ca devatā-śata-sahasrāṇāṃ dharmeṣu dharma-cakṣu viśuddhaṃ |
K01n742u_001:2780: 156. athāyuṣmān vāg-īśas tasyām eva parṣadi yāvad bhagavān āha |
K01n742u_001:2786: śūnyam asāram kañ ca kāyaṃ viditvā
K01n742u_001:2795: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat |
K01n742u_001:2796: kiṃ bhagavann imāhi śākiyāyinīhi purā pāpaṃ karma kṛtam yena etāyo evaṃ duḥkhām vedanām vedayanti |
K01n742u_001:2798: bhūta-pūrvam ānanda etāyo śākiyāyinīyo ihaiva śrāvastyāṃ ṣaḍ gaṇikāyo abhūvan |
K01n742u_001:2799: ihaiva śrāvastīyaṃ kālo nāma pratyeka-bhuddho abhūṣi |
K01n742u_001:2800: so dāni piṇḍāya caranto tāhi gaṇikāhi ukto |
K01n742u_001:2801: ayaṃ dāni śramaṇo svayaṃ kāmān paribhuñjati |
K01n742u_001:2803: tāhi hāsyābhiprāyāhi viheṭhanābhiprāyāhi anyehi dur-uktehi vacana-pathehi obhartsito aṅgāra-mallakehi cāvakīrṇaḥ |

K01n742u_001:3381: eṣo tāvan manuṣyo bhikṣuṇīya dadāti pātram vā cīvaram |
K01n742u_001:3389: tavaiva bhavatu dīrghāyuḥ labhiṣyāmaḥ vayam anyato pi |
K01n742u_001:3391: atha vācaṃ na bhāṣati hasta-vikāraṃ vā pāda-vikāraṃ vā akṣi-vikāraṃ vā karoti |
K01n742u_001:3398: atha khalu denaṃ deti prasannair indriyaiḥ |
K01n742u_001:3399: atha khalu tayā bhikṣuṇyā āśayena pratīcchitavyaṃ pratīcchati an-āpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:3400: evaṃ bhikṣor api rakta-cittā strī dadāti |
K01n742u_001:3406: yā puna bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya pātram cīvaram vā bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā glāna-bhaiṣajyam vā pratigṛhṇeya [aya]m api dharmo prathamāpattiko |

K01n742u_001:3436: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīṃ evaṃ vadeya |

K01n742u_001:3485: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya |
K01n742u_001:3486: yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ na pratiniḥsareya |
K01n742u_001:3490: tasyāḥ khalu bhikṣuṇyā bhikṣuṇyo bhavanti sahāyikā |
K01n742u_001:3491: ekā vā dvau vā trayo vā saṃbahulā vā |
K01n742u_001:3494: mā āryamiśrikāḥ etāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ kiñcid avavadittha |
K01n742u_001:3496: dharma-vādinī caiṣā bhikṣuṇī vinaya-vādinī caiṣā bhikṣuṇī |
K01n742u_001:3497: asmākaṃ caiṣā bhikṣuṇī chandañ ca ruciṃ ca sam-ādāya pragṛhya vyavaharati |
K01n742u_001:3498: yañ caitasyāḥ bhikṣuṇyāḥ kṣamate ca rocate ca asmākam api taṃ kṣamate ca rocate ca |
K01n742u_001:3499: jānantī caiṣā bhikṣuṇī bhāṣate no a-jānanti |
K01n742u_001:3500: tā bhikṣuṇyo bhikṣuṇībhir evam asya vacanīyāḥ |

K01n742u_001:3509: evañ ca tā bhikṣuṇyo bhikṣuṇībhiḥ ucyamānā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareṃsuḥ ity etat kuśalaṃ |
K01n742u_001:3510: no ce pratiniḥsareṃsuḥ tā bhikṣuṇyo bhikṣuṇībhiḥ yāvat-tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastu[sya] pratiniḥsargāya |
K01n742u_001:3511: yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareṃsuḥ ity etat kuśalaṃ |
K01n742u_001:3513: tad eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheyuḥ |
K01n742u_001:3518: tatra sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī adhikaraṇāny utpādayati |
K01n742u_001:3520: sā saṃghaṃ ākrośati saṃgham a-gati-gamanena prāpayati |

K01n742u_001:3535: mā ārye chandan niśrāya saṃgham ākroṣitavyam manyasi paribhāṣitavyam manyasi |
K01n742u_001:3536: sā tvam evam ucyamānī na pratikramasi dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyam adhyucyamāni na pratikramasi |
K01n742u_001:3541: tṛṣkṛtvā saṃgha-madhye samanugrāhatha samanubhāṣatha etasya va[stu]sya pratiniḥsargāya |
K01n742u_001:3543: satyaṃ tvam ārye nande saṃgham a-gati-gamanena prāpayati (si) |
K01n742u_001:3544: alam ārye nande saṃgham a-gati-gamanena prāpayituṃ |
K01n742u_001:3545: yāvat khalu te ārye mitrāya karaṇīyaṃ artha-kāmāya hitaiṣiṇīya karoti |
K01n742u_001:3550: satyaṃ tvam ārye nande saṃgham a-gati-gamanena prāpayasi |
K01n742u_001:3553: sā tāva saṃgha-madhye pi vaktavyā peyālaṃ |
K01n742u_001:3555: anubhāṣṭā bhagavan āryā nandā triṣkṛtvā kuv-ege triṣkṛtvā ma[hā-ja]ne triṣkṛtvā saṃghamadhye etasya vastunaḥ pratiniḥsargāya |
K01n742u_001:3564: nanv ahaṃ nande aneka-paryāyeṇa daurvacasyaṃ vigarhāmi yāvan naivaṃ kurvato vṛddhir bhavati kūśaleṣu dharmeṣu atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati |
K01n742u_001:3579: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir evam asya vacanīyā |

K01n742u_001:3589: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir ucyamāna tad eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya |
K01n742u_001:3590: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣūṇībhiḥ yāvat-tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratinissargāya |
K01n742u_001:3591: yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamānā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etat kuślaṃ |

K01n742u_001:3599: evam dvitīyā-tṛtīyām vā vācāyāṃ yāvad vyavaropitāyāṃ saṃghātiśeṣaṃ |
K01n742u_001:3604: sthūlātyayāḥ sarve te pratiprasrabhyanti sthāpayitvā aṣṭau sthūlātyayāḥ |

K01n742u_001:3608: abhūṣi me saṃgham a-gati-gamanena prāpayiṣyan ti prāpayāmi prāpayiṣyāmi ceti evaṃ pratiniḥsargārhaṃ |
K01n742u_001:3610: abhūṣi me saṃgham a-gatigamanena prāpayiṣyan ti prāpitañ ca |
K01n742u_001:3611: na khalv idānīṃ prāpayāmi na ca prāpayiṣyāmīty a-pratiniḥsargārhaṃ |
K01n742u_001:3617: saṃgho doṣa-gāmī ca bhaya-gāmī ca saṃgho |

K01n742u_001:3632: sā bhikṣuṇ bhikṣunībhir yāvat-tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya |
K01n742u_001:3634: taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etat skaṇaṃ (kuśalaṃ) |
K01n742u_001:3641: sā uddeśa-paryavasānehi śikṣāpadehi bhikṣuṇīhi śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena vucyamānā |

K01n742u_001:3648: mā me āryamiśrikāyo kiñcid vadatha kalyāṇam vā pāpakaṃ vā |

K01n742u_001:3654: āryā pi bhikṣuṇīyo vadantu śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena |
K01n742u_001:3655: āryam api bhikṣuṇīyo vakṣyanti śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena |
K01n742u_001:3656: evaṃ saṃvṛddhā khalu punar ārye tasya bhagavatas tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksambuddhasya parṣā yad idam anyamanya-vacanīyā anyamanyāpatti-vyutthāpanīyā
K01n742u_001:3657: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇīhi vucyamānā tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya |
K01n742u_001:3659: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya |
K01n742u_001:3660: yāvāt-tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇa vā tam vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ |
K01n742u_001:3661: no ca pratiniḥsareya tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya |
K01n742u_001:3665: etā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo nandā ca śākya-kanyā uttarā ca māsoraka-dhītā kāyikena saṃsargeṇa saṃsṛṣṭā hi viharanti |
K01n742u_001:3670: kinti dāni kāyikena saṃsargeṇa saṃsṛṣṭā viharanti |
K01n742u_001:3679: dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyam apy uktā na pratikramanti |

K01n742u_001:3683: bhikṣuṇī[yo] khalu punar dve saṃsṛṣṭā viharanti |
K01n742u_001:3685: tā bhikṣuṇīyo bhikṣuṇīhi evam asya vacanīyā |
K01n742u_001:3688: nānā vo viharantīnāṃ vṛddhir eva pratikāṃkṣitavyā kuśalehi dharmehi |
K01n742u_001:3690: evaṃ ca tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo bhikṣuṇīhi vucyamānās taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:3692: no ca pratinissareṃsuḥ tā bhikṣuṇīyo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvat-tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyāḥ samanubhāṣitavyāḥ tasya vastusya pratinissargāya |
K01n742u_001:3693: yāvat-tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareṃsuḥ itya etaṃ kuśalaṃ |
K01n742u_001:3694: no ca pratinissareṃsuḥ tam evam vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:3696: bhikṣuṇīyo khalu puna dve saṃsṛṣṭā viharanti yathā nandā ca śākyakanyā uttarā ca māśoraka-dhītā |
K01n742u_001:3699: tā bhikṣuṇīyo yathā nandā ca śākya-kanyā uttarā ca māśoraka-dhītā |
K01n742u_001:3705: yāvat tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:3706: yaṃ taṃ vastuṃ saṃsṛṣṭā viharanti anyamanyasyāvadyāni praticchā[da]yanti |
K01n742u_001:3707: tā bhikṣuṇīyo ti yathā nandā ca śākya-kanyā uttarā ca māśoraka-dhitā |
K01n742u_001:3708: bhikṣuṇīhīti saṃghena mahā-janena eka-pudgalena yāvat-tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā |
K01n742u_001:3709: trikkhutto kuvege trikkhutto mahā-jane trikkhutto saṃgha-madhye samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya |
K01n742u_001:3710: yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ |

K01n742u_001:4146: eṣo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo kācit pātram vā cīvaram vā ghṛtam vā tailam vā cetāpayituṃ mūlyan deti |
K01n742u_001:4151: atha a-niyataṃ deti yaṃ icchati taṃ jā[nā]peti an-āpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:4155: bhikṣavor apy evam eva āpattis tu vinayātikaramaḥ |
K01n742u_001:4157: yam vā icchasi taṃ gṛhṇāhīti taṃ gṛhṇāti an-āpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:4159: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anyoddeśakenānyaṃ cetāpayati niḥsargika-pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:4163: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī saṃghasya bhaktakāni samādāyeti |
K01n742u_001:4167: tā dāni striyo chandakaṃ prajantīntīyo jalpanti |
K01n742u_001:4171: atha sā khādati ca pibati ca pātraṃ ca jānāpeti |
K01n742u_001:4172: tāya khāditāvaśeṣeṇa yādṛśaṃ vā bhaktaṃ kṛtaṃ |
K01n742u_001:4182: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:4187: satyaṃ nande evan-nāma tvam anyeṣām arthāya yācitvā anyaṃ cetāpayasi |
K01n742u_001:4191: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajapatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati |
K01n742u_001:4192: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti |
K01n742u_001:4193: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anyeṣām arthāya yācayitvā ātmano pātram vā cīvaram vā bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā glāna-pratyaya-bhaiṣajya-pariṣkārān vā cetāpayati
K01n742u_001:4197: anyeṣām arthāya yācayitvā saṃghasya bhaktasya vā tarpaṇasya vā yvāgū-pānasya vā yācitvā ātmano pātram vā cīvaram vā bhaktam vā bhojyam vā glānapratyaya-bhaiṣajya-pariṣkārān vā cetāpayen nissargika-pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:4198: atha khalu yasyārthāya yācati tam eva jānāpayitavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:4199: atha dāni vastraṃ vipraṇāmeti bhaktasya vā tarpaṇasya vā yvāgū-pānasya vā arthāya yācayitvā vaibhaṅgikaṃ dadāti |
K01n742u_001:4200: śayyāsanam vā upasthāpeti vārṣikam vā hemantikam vā deti |
K01n742u_001:4202: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī saṃghasya bhaktaṃ dāpeti |
K01n742u_001:4204: yadi tahiṃ kiñcic cheṣaṃ bhavati odanam vā sūpam vā yāvad bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā upadarśayitavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:4215: bhikṣor api evam eva āpattis tu vinyātikramaḥ |
K01n742u_001:4217: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anyeṣām arthāya yācayitvā ātmano pātram vā cīvaram vā bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā glāna-[pratyaya]-bhaiṣajya [pariṣkārān vā ] cetāpayen niḥsargika-pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:4223: tā dān āhaṃsuḥ yāva pātrāṇi saṃkrāmayemaḥ |
K01n742u_001:4224: tāyo dāni an-astamite sūrye pravṛttāḥ saṃkrāmayituṃ |
K01n742u_001:4233: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocenti |
K01n742u_001:4242: evañ ca nāma yūyaṃ pātra-sannicayaṃ karotha |
K01n742u_001:4243: tena hi na kṣamati pātra-sannicayaṃ kartuṃ |
K01n742u_001:4244: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati |
K01n742u_001:4245: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryava-dātāni bhaviṣyanti |
K01n742u_001:4246: yā puna bhikṣuṇī pātra-sannicayaṃ kuryān niḥsargika-pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:4248: pātra-sannicayan ti pātran nāma sumbhakaṃ upa-sambhakaṃ |
K01n742u_001:4252: sannicayaṃ kuryād iti saṃgrahaṃ kuryān nissargikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ |
K01n742u_001:4260: etā(taṃ) dāni bhikṣuṇīye parimāṇaṃ baddhaṃ pātra-dhāraṇaṃ |
K01n742u_001:4261: kiñcāpi bhikṣuḥ bahukāny api pātrāṇi vikalpetvā paribhuñjāti an-āpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:4263: yā puna bhikṣuṇī pātra-sannicayaṃ kuryān niḥsargika-pācattikaṃ
K01n742u_001:4269: tā dān āhaṃsuḥ yāvac cīvarāṇi saṃkrāmemaḥ |
K01n742u_001:4270: tāyo dāni an-astamite sūrye pravṛttāḥ saṃkrāmayituṃ |
K01n742u_001:4280: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:4288: etaṃ dāni bhikṣuṇīye parimāṇaṃ baddhañ cīvaradhāraṇaṃ |
K01n742u_001:4289: kiñcāpi bhikṣu bahukāni cīvarāṇi mitrāṇāṃ vikalpayitvā paribhuñjāti an-āpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:4295: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī cīvarāṇi naiva dhovati na sīveti na rañjeti |
K01n742u_001:4297: upāśraye nikṣiptā yā icchati sā upādīyatū ti |
K01n742u_001:4300: ārye etāṃ saṃghāṭiṃ dhoviya sīviya phoṣiya prāvṛtā |
K01n742u_001:4302: ānehi ārye etāṃ saṃghāṭiṃ mahyaṃ eṣā saṃghāṭī |
K01n742u_001:4303: paśyatha āryamiśrikāyo na kiñcic chakyate upāśraye nikṣipituṃ |
K01n742u_001:4305: dhṛṣṭā ca mukharā ca pragalbhā ca sā dāni tāya saṃghāṭī ācchinnā |
K01n742u_001:4306: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:4309: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇy-upāśraye purāṇa-saṃghāṭiṃ nikṣipetvā vā nikṣipāyetvā vā yā icchati sā upādīyatū ti |
K01n742u_001:4310: uktvā paścāt svayam eva upādiyeya nissargika-pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:4317: yā icchati sā upādīyatū ti paścāt svayam eva upādīyeta niḥsargika-pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:4318: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇī-upāśraye cīvaraṃ nikṣipetvā vā nikṣipāyetvā vā yā icchati sā upādīyatū ti yadi kāci upādinnam bhavati na kṣamati ācchindituṃ
K01n742u_001:4320: atha dāni na kāyaci upādinnam bhavati tasyā eva ca tāya artho bhavati kiñcāpi gṛhṇāti an-āpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:4321: atha dāni kṣudrānukṣudrakaṃ pariṣkāraṃ nikṣiptam bhavati yadi kāyaci upādinnam bhavati na kṣamati ācchindituṃ |
K01n742u_001:4323: bhikṣur api bhikṣu-vihāre pātram vā cīvaram vā upānaham vā kṣudrānukṣudrakam vā pariṣkāraṃ nikṣipitvā yo icchati so upādīyatū ti |
K01n742u_001:4324: yadi kenacid upādinnam bhavati na kṣamati ācchincituṃ |
K01n742u_001:4326: atha na kenacid gṛhītam bhavati so eva tenārthiko bhavati kiñcāpi gṛhṇāti an-āpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:4328: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇy -upāśraye purāṇa-saṃghāṭiṃ nikṣipetvā vā nikṣipāyetvā vā yā icchati sā upādīyatū ti uktvā paścāt svayam eva upādīyeya
K01n742u_001:4333: aparāya dāni bhikṣuṇīya purāṇa-saṃghāṭī omalina-malinā dhovitvā niḥsīvitvā ātape dattvā vāto ca pravāpito |
K01n742u_001:4336: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye āroceṃti |
K01n742u_001:4338: evan nāma tvaṃ purāṇa-saṃghāṭīṃ niḥsīvitvā na pratisa[ṃ]dhaisi na pratisandhāpayasi |
K01n742u_001:4341: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo śākiya-kanyāyo mallakanyāyo lecchavi -kanyāyo su-kumārāyo bhārikāṃ saṃghāṭiṃ dhovantīyo kilamyanti |
K01n742u_001:4342: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:4346: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīm gautamīm āmantrayati |
K01n742u_001:4348: yā puna bhikṣuṇī purāṇa-saṃghāṭiṃ niḥsīvitvā niḥsivāpetvā vā uttari ṣaṭ-pañca-rātram a-gilānā na pratisandhāye na pratisandhāpayena niḥsargika-pācattikaṃ
K01n742u_001:4354: uttarīti ṣaṭ-pañca-rātram iti na dāni ṣaṭ-pañca ca |
K01n742u_001:4355: atha khalu paramaṃ ṣaṭ-rātran na pratisandheyaiti svayaṃ na pratisandhāpeyā ti pareṇa |
K01n742u_001:4359: eṣā dāni bhikṣuṇīye saṃghāṭī malinā bhavati |
K01n742u_001:4360: yadi tāva lahukā bhoti tathā yeva dhovitavyā |
K01n742u_001:4362: atha dāni sārikā bhoti niḥsīvetvā niḥsīvitvā dhovitavyā |
K01n742u_001:4364: sāharitvā gopiṭake vā kuṇḍake vā paṭalake vā sthāpayitvā kāṣṭha-khaṇḍena vā upala-khaṇḍena vā ākramitavyā |
K01n742u_001:4366: atha dāni bhājanan na bhavati ekasthāne ākramiya iṣṭakena vā upala-khaṇḍena vā sthāpayitavyā |
K01n742u_001:4367: paścād antevāsiṇīya vā samānopādhyāyinīyā vā bhikṣuṇīya pratisandhāpayitavyā svayam vā pratisandhetavyā |
K01n742u_001:4368: atha dāni jarā-durbalā vyādhi-durbalā vā bhavati kiñcāpi cireṇa pratisandheti an-āpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:4370: yā puna bhikṣuṇī purāṇa-saṃghāṭīn niḥsīvitvā vā niḥsīvāpetvā vā uttari ṣaṭ-pañca-rātraṃ aglānā na pratisandhe vā na pratisandhāpeya vā niḥsargika-pācattikaṃ
K01n742u_001:4385: evam eva yāva sā vilakṣeti nopasampādeti |
K01n742u_001:4386: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:4389: yā puna bhikṣuṇī śikṣamāṇām evam uktvā yadi me cīvaraṃ desi tato ham upasampādayiṣyāmīti tāye cīvaraṃ gṛhya nopasampādayen niḥsargika-pācattikaṃ
K01n742u_001:4394: cīvaran ti cīvaraṃ nāma kambalaṃ karpāsaṃ yāvat saṃkakṣikā |
K01n742u_001:4396: sā taṃ cīvaraṃ gṛhṇitvā ti yathā sthūlanandā bhikṣuṇī na upasampādayed iti svayan na upasampādayet niḥsargikapācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:4398: eṣā tāva bhikṣuṇī śikṣyamāṇāyā cīvaraṃ gṛhṇāti |
K01n742u_001:4401: atha dāni apratibalā bhavati jarā-durbalā vyādhi-durbalā vā anyā adhyeṣitavyā |
K01n742u_001:4402: vaktavyā etasyā mayā cīvaraṃ gṛhītvā imām upasthāpehi |
K01n742u_001:4403: atha sā necchati taṃ cīvaraṃ pratidātavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:4405: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī cīvaraṃ gṛhītvā na upasthāpeti na cīvaraṃ pratidadāti niḥsargika-pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:4409: [va]ditvā yadi me cīvararaṃ desi tato ham upasaṃpādayiṣyan ti tasyāś cīvaraṃ pratigṛhṇītvā na upasaṃpādayen niḥsargika-pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:4413: aparo dāni vāṇijako śatasahasra-mūlyaṃ kambala-ratanam ādāya uttarā pathāto āgato |
K01n742u_001:4414: so dāni aparehi pṛcchito kim asya mūlyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:4417: naiva rājā krīṇāti na rāja-putrāḥ na vaṇijāḥ na sārthavāhāḥ |
K01n742u_001:4418: so dāni vāṇijako vīthīm abhiruhitvā cintā-sāgaram anupraviṣṭo āsati |
K01n742u_001:4419: imaṃ mahārghaṃ mūlyaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ bahu-śulkaṃ na vikrāyati |
K01n742u_001:4427: gaccha eṣā bhadrā nāma śramaṇikā sā krīṇīṣyati |
K01n742u_001:4428: so dāni taṃ ceṭakasya skandhe āropayitvā bhikṣuṇī -vihāraṃ gatvā pṛcchati |
K01n742u_001:4441: sā dāni na paṇeti na paṇāpeti |
K01n742u_001:4443: gaccha sālohitaṃ jalpāhi imasya śatasahasraṃ vīthīkāto dāpehīti |
K01n742u_001:4455: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:4460: tad eva sarvaṃ yāvad ām bhagavan |
K01n742u_001:4462: nanu bhadre paścimā pi nāma janatā avalokayitavyā |
K01n742u_001:4463: tena hi na kṣamati uttari catuṣkarṣeṇa guru-prāvaraṇaṃ cetāpayituṃ |
K01n742u_001:4465: yā puna bhikṣuṇī uttari catuṣ-karṣeṇa guru-prāvaraṇaṃ cetāpayati ṅissargika-pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:4466: uttari catuṣ-karṣeṇeti karṣo nāma catvāraḥ purāṇāḥ |
K01n742u_001:4470: tad uttariṃ paraṃ ṣoḍaṣehi purāṇehi cetāpayati niḥsargika-pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:4472: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī guru-prāvaraṇaṃ cetāpayitu-kāmā bhavati catuṣ-karṣa-mūlyaṃ jānāpayitavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:4473: pratyavaro vā tad uttariṃ na kṣamati |
K01n742u_001:4474: atha dāni kocid ayācito avijñapto mahārgha-mūlyaṃ pi dadāti pratigṛhṇāty an-āpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:4476: kiñcāpi bhikṣur mahārgha-mūlyaṃ pi jānāpayitvā paribhuñjāty anāpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:4478: yā puna bhikṣuṇī uttari catu[ṣ-ka]rṣa-mūlyāto guru-prāvaraṇaṃ cetāpayen niḥsargika-pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:4492: so dāni tam ādāya bhikṣuṇī-vihāraṃ gato |
K01n742u_001:4507: sā na svayaṃ paṇeti na paṇāpeti |
K01n742u_001:4509: gaccha sālohitaṃ jalpāhi imasya pīṭhikāto daśa-purāṇa-sahasrāṇi dehīti |
K01n742u_001:4510: so dāni aparehi pṛcchito vikrītaṃ te bhāṇḍaṃ |
K01n742u_001:4519: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:4522: nanu bhadre paścimā pi nāma janatā avalokayitavyā |
K01n742u_001:4523: tena hi na kṣamati uttari aṭā(ḍḍhā)
K01n742u_001:4525: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti |
K01n742u_001:4526: yā puna bhikṣuṇī uttari aḍḍhātiya-karṣa-mūlyāto sūkṣmaṃ cīvaraṃ cetāpayen nissargika-pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:4532: niḥsargika pācattikaṃ yāvat yā puna bhikṣuṇī sukhumaṃ cīvaraṃ jānāpayati daśa-purāṇa-mūlyaṃ jānāpayitavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:4535: atha dānī kocid ayācito avijñapto mahārgha-mūlyaṃ pi dadāti śatikam vā sāhasrikam vā yadi kiñcāpi paribhuñjāti an-āpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:4536: kiñcāpi bhikṣu śatasahasra-mūlyaṃ pi jānāpayaty an-āpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:4538: yā puna bhikṣuṇī uttari aḍḍhātiya-karṣa-mūlyāto sukhumaṃ cīvaraṃ cetāpayen niḥsargika-pācattikaṃ | uddānaṃ |
K01n742u_001:4550: so dāni kāṣṭha-vāham ādāya antarāpaṇam okasto |
K01n742u_001:4569: so dāni manuṣya paśyati yady ahaṃ dvau kārṣāpaṇā labhāmi mah'-argham mayā vikrītaṃ bhaviṣyati |
K01n742u_001:4570: so taṃ adhikaritvā kāṣṭha-vāha-mūlyaṃ gṛhṇiya śaka[ṭa]m āruhitvā tasyāpaṇikasyāgratenopayāti |
K01n742u_001:4588: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocenti yāvad bhagavān āha |
K01n742u_001:4589: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī paropagataṃ cetāpayen niḥsargikapācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:4591: jānantīti svayam vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya ākāravantena darśanena ākāravantena śramaṇena |
K01n742u_001:4596: etaṃ dāni āpaṇikasya vā prāvarikasya vā kiñcid bhāṇḍam upagatam bhavati |
K01n742u_001:4597: tena ca bhikṣuṇī arthīkā bhavati na dāni kṣamati tahiṃ antarāyayituṃ |
K01n742u_001:4599: atha khu ekā śca sthitvā pratipālayitavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:4610: atha dāni bhikṣuṇīye kiñcid upakreyam bhavati pātram vā cīvaram vā na kṣamati antarā yatituṃ |
K01n742u_001:4612: atha dāni saṃgha-madhye vaḍḍho vaḍḍhikāya jānāpayati an-āpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:4613: bhikṣur api paropagataṃ cetāpayati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:4615: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī paropagataṃ cetāpayen nissargika-pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:4627: caturthaṃ ca bhikṣuṇīnāṃ pratigrahaṃ uddharitvā na jātarūpaṃ samodahet |
K01n742u_001:4633: tatra nirdiṣṭā triṃśad daśa ca anūnāḥ kāraṇe samutpanne naiḥsargika bhagavatā nirdiṣṭā bhikṣuṇī-sūtre ||

K01n742u_001:6277: bhikṣur api sārdhaṃ vihāri[naṃ] nāvāvadati nānuśāsati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:6279: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upasthāyikā upasthāpitāṃ dve varṣāṇi nāva-vaden nānuśāset pācattikaṃ ||4 ||
K01n742u_001:6283: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo upasthāpitāḥ anyena gacchanti |
K01n742u_001:6289: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:6296: bhikṣuṇīyo evaṃ nāma yūyam upasthāpitāḥ anyena gacchatha |
K01n742u_001:6297: tena hi upasthāpitāya upasthāyikā dve varṣāṇi anubandhitavyā |
K01n742u_001:6298: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati |
K01n742u_001:6299: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti |
K01n742u_001:6300: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upasthāpitā upasthāyikāṃ dve varṣāṇi nopasthihen nānubandhet pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:6306: nānubandhed iti yena gacchati tena na gacchati pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:6308: atha dāni sā upasthāyikā aśikṣā-kāmā bhavati śaithilikā vā bāhulikā vā |
K01n742u_001:6310: sā me brahmacaryāntarāyo bhaveya dṛṣṭvānukṛtim āpadyantīyeti anyena gacchati an-āpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:6312: bhikṣur api upādhyāyaṃ dve varṣān nopasthihati nānubandhati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:6314: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upasthāpitā upasthāyikāṃ dve varṣāṇī nopasthihen nānubandhet pācattikaṃ ||5 ||
K01n742u_001:6320: kin nu khalv etaṃ labhyaṃ kartuṃ |
K01n742u_001:6324: tena hi na kṣamati anu-varṣam upasthāpayituṃ |
K01n742u_001:6326: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anu-varṣam upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:6331: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anu-varṣam upasthāpayeti pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:6334: atha dāni bhikṣuṇī kṛtapuṇyā bhavati ekaṃ varṣaṃ śikṣā deśayitavyā |
K01n742u_001:6338: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anu-varṣam upasthāpayet pācattikam ||6 ||
K01n742u_001:6343: sā antevāsinīṃ bhikṣuṇīhi upasaṃpādīyāna sthūlanandāṃ bhikṣuṇīm āha |
K01n742u_001:6344: ārye mama antevāsinī upasampādyā sādhu ārye āryamiśrikānāṃ gaṇaṃ paryeṣehi |
K01n742u_001:6348: tāya dāni aparaṃ divasaṃ bhadrakāṇāṃ bhikṣuṇāṃ gaṇaṃ samudānayitvā upasaṃpādayitvā |
K01n742u_001:6349: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo majāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:6351: duṣkṛtaṃ te jete evan nāma tvaṃ ekato viśuddhāṃ parivāsikinīm upasthāpayasi |
K01n742u_001:6353: tena hi na kṣamati gaṇam avajānituṃ |
K01n742u_001:6356: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ekato viśuddhāṃ parivāsikinīm upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:6360: upasthāpayed iti upasampādayen na bhikṣu-gaṇena pārājikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:6364: atha khalu pratikṛty eva tāva bhadrakāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ gaṇo samudānayitavyo |
K01n742u_001:6365: atha dāni anye bhadrakāḥ anye a-bhadrakāḥ tathā kartavyaṃ yathā bhadrottarāṇi karmāṇi bhavanti |
K01n742u_001:6367: atha dāni gaṇam avajānāti vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:6368: atha dāni senābhayaṃ vā bhavati para-cakra-bhayaṃ vā nagaroparodho vā kiñcāpi pārivāsikinīm upasthāpayety an-āpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:6370: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ekato viśuddhāṃ pārivāsikīnīm upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ ||7 ||
K01n742u_001:6374: yā sā kālīya triy-antarā lecchavi-dhītā upasthāpitā |
K01n742u_001:6375: sā dāni āgārikehi ca sārdhaṃ saṃsṛṣṭā viharati |
K01n742u_001:6377: ārye kāli yā dāni [upasthāpitā] tvaṃ jānāsi āgārikehi ca parivrājakehi ca saṃṣṛṣṭāṃ |
K01n742u_001:6378: kim arthaṃ na vyapakarṣasi na vyapakarṣāpayasi |
K01n742u_001:6379: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:6381: duṣkṛtaṃ te kāli yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti
K01n742u_001:6382: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upasthāyikā upasthāpitāṃ tathā-rūpāsu a(ā)
K01n742u_001:6383: padāsu na vyapakarṣen na vyapakarṣāpayed antaśaḥ ṣaṭ-pañca yojanā ti pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:6387: tathā-rūpāsu āpadāsū ti svayam vā pratyodhāvitu-kāmo(mā)
K01n742u_001:6388: jñātikā vā pratyodhāvayitu-kāmā anyehi vā saṃsṛṣṭā bhavati |
K01n742u_001:6389: na vyupakarṣatīti svayaṃ na vyupakarṣāpayatīti parehi |
K01n742u_001:6390: antamasato ṣaṭ-pañca yojanā ti na dāni ṣaṭ-pañca ca paramaṃ |
K01n742u_001:6393: eṣā dāni bhikṣuṇīye sārdham vihāriṇī vā antevāsinī vā saṃsṛṣṭā bhavati vyapakarṣitavyā vā vyapakarṣāpayitavyā vā cārikāya varṇo bhāṣitavyaḥ
K01n742u_001:6394: atha dāni jarā-durbalāvā vyādhi-durbalā vā bhoti anyāhi bhikṣuṇīhi vyakpakarṣayitavyā |
K01n742u_001:6398: yadā vayaṃ taruṇīyo āsi evam asmābhir aṭitaṃ |
K01n742u_001:6399: bhikṣur api sārdhaṃ vihāriṃ utkaṇṭhitan na vyapakarṣayati na vyapakarṣāpayati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:6401: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upasthāyikā upasthāpitāṃ tathā-rūpāsv āpadāsu na vyapakarṣayet na vyapakarṣāpayet antamasato ṣaṭ-pañca yojanā ti pācattikaṃ
K01n742u_001:6407: tā indra-gavā viya vardhanti śiva-cchagalā viya vardhanti |
K01n742u_001:6410: sā dāni bhikṣuṇīhi vuccati kim punar āryāye an-aṅgopetāye upasthāpitena yaṃ āryā-m-evaṃ vaktavyā anuśāsitavyā |
K01n742u_001:6412: kiṃ bhadrāyiṇīyo irṣyā-pathā mama parṣām upasthāpayantīyo |
K01n742u_001:6413: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:6415: duṣkṛtaṃ te nande evan nāma tvaṃ kṣiyā-dharmam āpadyesi |
K01n742u_001:6416: tena hi na kṣamati kṣiyā-dharmam āpadyituṃ |
K01n742u_001:6417: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati |
K01n742u_001:6422: yaṃ āryā evam vaktavyā anuśāsitavyety uktā samānā kṣiyā-dharmam āpadyeya pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:6425: kim punar āryāye an-aṅgopetāye ti daśahi aṅgehi samanvāgatā aṅgopetā |
K01n742u_001:6431: yasyā imāni daśāṅgāni na samvidyante sā bhavati an-aṅgopetā |
K01n742u_001:6432: kṣiyādharmam āpadyeya ti vivācayet pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ |
K01n742u_001:6433: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi yucyamānā kim punar āryāye an-aṅgopetāye u[pa] sthāpiteneti kṣiyā-dharmam āpadyeya pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:6434: bhikṣur api bhikṣūhi vucyamāno kim punar āyuṣmato an-aṅgopetasya upasthāpiteneti kṣiyā-dharmam āpadyeya vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:6436: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi evaṃ vucyamānā kim punar āryāye an-aṅgopetāye upasthāpiteneti uktā kṣiyā-dharmam āpadyeya pācattikaṃ ||9 ||
K01n742u_001:6441: sādhu me ārye nande upasaṃpādaya māṃ |
K01n742u_001:6446: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:6454: yā puna bhikṣuṇī śikṣamāṇām evaṃ vādet |
K01n742u_001:6455: yadā pūra-śikṣā bhaviṣyasi tato ham upasthāpayiṣyan ti vaditvā naivopasaṃpādayen na visarjayet pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:6458: śikṣamāṇeti aṣṭādaśehi varttehi dve varṣāṇi deśtita-śikṣā |
K01n742u_001:6459: evam vadeyā ti yathā sthūlanandā bhikṣuṇī |
K01n742u_001:6461: atha dāni na pratibalā bhavati anyā adhyeṣitavyā |
K01n742u_001:6462: atha dāni naivātmanā upasthāpayati nāpy anyāṃ adhyeṣayati na visarjayati |
K01n742u_001:6464: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī śikṣamāṇām uktvā ahan te upasthāpayiṣyan ti paścān nopasampādayen na visarjayet pācattikaṃ ||10 ||
K01n742u_001:6468: atha bhadrā kāpileyī catur-yuktaṃ yānam abhiruhitvā jñāti-kulaṃ gacchati |
K01n742u_001:6471: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:6473: yā puna bhikṣuṇī yānam abhiruhyet pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:6476: tā dāni śākīya-kanyāḥ kolīyakanyāḥ lecchavi-kanyāś ca prakṛti-sukumārāḥ pravrajitāḥ |
K01n742u_001:6478: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:6481: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati yāvat |
K01n742u_001:6482: yā puna bhikṣuṇī a-gilānā yānam abhiruhet pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:6484: a-gilānā ti pratyuddhṛtaṃ bhagavatā padaṃ an-āpattiḥ gilānāye |
K01n742u_001:6485: glānyaṃ nāma jarā-durbalā vā vyādhi-durbalā vā prakṛti-sukumārā vā na śaknoti pada āgacchantu idam atra gailānyam abhipretaṃ |
K01n742u_001:6486: yānan nāma hasti-yānaṃ aśvayānam uṣṭra-yānaṃ go-yānaṃ gardabha-yānaṃ nāvā-yānaṃ śivikā-yānaṃ yāna-yānam eva aṣṭamaṃ |
K01n742u_001:6489: yatra uṣṭrā vā goṇā vā yuktā bhavanti |
K01n742u_001:6491: yahiṃ uṣṭrīyo vā goṇīyo vā yuktā bhavanti tahiṃ āruhitavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:6492: atha dāni a-saṃjñikā bhavati na strīṃ na puruṣaṃ jānāti an-āpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:6493: atha [dāni] nāvāya aparāt param uttaraty an-āpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:6494: ūrdhvaṅ-gāminīyam vā adho-gāminīyam vā pratyayo adhiṣṭhihitavyo mā mariṣyāmīti |
K01n742u_001:6495: bhikṣur api a-gilāno yānam-abhiruhati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:6498: yā puna bhikṣuṇī a-gilānā yānam abhiruhet pācattikaṃ |rā ||
K01n742u_001:6502: bhadrā kāpileyī chatreṇa gṛhītena upānahābhyām ābaddhābhyāṃ jñāti-kulaṃ gacchati |
K01n742u_001:6504: paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇikā adyāpīyaṃ pravrajitā pi maha-cchandā |
K01n742u_001:6505: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:6510: tā dāni śākīya-kanyāḥ lecchavi-kumārāḥ pravrajitā gacchantīyo ātapena dahyante |
K01n742u_001:6511: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:6514: yā puna bhikṣuṇī a-gilānā chatropānahaṃ dhārayet pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:6516: a-gilānā ti pratyuddhṛtaṃ bhagavatā padaṃ an-āpattir gilānāye |
K01n742u_001:6518: jarā-durbalā vā vyādhi-durbalā va prakṛti-sukumārā vā |
K01n742u_001:6520: chatropānaha iti chatran nāma bhūrja-chatraṃ tāla-chatraṃ veṇu-chatraṃ parṇa-chatraṃ caila-chatram |
K01n742u_001:6524: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī a-gilānā chatran dhāreti na upānahāṃ vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:6525: upānahān dhāreya na chatraṃ vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:6528: bhikṣur api picu-mastakādi chatraṃ dhāreti saṃpuṭām vā anirmokāṃ vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:6530: yā puna bhikṣuṇī a-gilānā chatropānahaṃ dhārayet pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:6535: teṣāṃ śayyā āstṛta-pratyāstṛtā dvi-kaḍevara tri-kaḍevarehi niśreṇīya āruhyati |
K01n742u_001:6539: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:6542: tad eva sarvaṃ bhagavān vistareṇa pṛcchati |
K01n742u_001:6545: evaṃ nāma tvaṃ atireka-prāmāṇike mañce vā pīṭhe vā abhiniṣīdati(si)
K01n742u_001:6547: tena hi na kṣamati atireka-prāmāṇike mañce vā pīṭhe vā abhiniṣīdituṃ vā abhinipadyitum vā |
K01n742u_001:6548: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti |
K01n742u_001:6549: yā puna bhikṣuṇī atireka-prāmāṇike mañce vā pīṭhe vā abhiniṣīdeya vā abhinipadyeya vā pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:6552: mañce vā pīṭhe vā ti caturdaśa mañcāḥ caturdaśa pīṭhāḥ |
K01n742u_001:6554: abhinipadyeya vā ti śayyāṃ kalpayet pācatikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:6556: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī sakṛn niṣaṇṇā divasaṃ pi niṣīdati ekaṃ pācattikam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:6557: atha puno puno niṣīdati tāvatyaḥ pācattikāḥ |
K01n742u_001:6558: atireka-pramāṇaṃ bhūmau nikhanitvā upaviśati vā nipadyati vā an-āpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:6559: bhikṣur api atireka-prāmāṇike mañce vā pīṭhe vā niṣīdati vā abhinipadyati vā vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:6563: māṇike mañce vā pīṭhe vā abhiniṣīdeya vā abhinipadyeya vā pācattikaṃ ||2 ||
K01n742u_001:6567: tā dāni ṣaḍ-vargiṇīyo bhikṣuṇīyo ekāstaraṇa-prāvaraṇāṃ śayyāṃ kalpayanti |
K01n742u_001:6568: tāyo mañcāṃ bhañjanti biśikāṃ pāṭenti catur-asrakāṃ pāṭenti |
K01n742u_001:6569: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:6574: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ekāstaraṇa-prāvaraṇāṃ saha-śayyāṃ kalpayet pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:6578: śeyyā ti paṃgula-mañco paṃgula-pīṭho yāvat kaṭa-kilaṃjādayo |
K01n742u_001:6583: trihi pīṭhehi dvihi janāhīti pādāṃ prāsārayantīhi tathā prasārayitavyāḥ yathā anyamanyasya jāna(nu)
K01n742u_001:6586: tiryak prajñaptāyā tṛhi janehi śayitavyaṃ pāṭiyaka-pāṭiyakehi pratyāstaraṇehi yathā caturasrake yathā pīṭhe |
K01n742u_001:6587: atha dāni tṛṇādi saṃstaro bhavati na kṣamati ati-bahuṃ ākramituṃ |
K01n742u_001:6588: atha khu nir-muṣṭikaṃ samaṃ prajñāpayitavyaṃ pāṭiyaka-pāṭiyakehi pratyāstaraṇehi |
K01n742u_001:6589: atha dāni śītam bhavati svaka-svakāny antarī-karaṇāni kṛtvā ekaṃ saṃcelī kartavyā |
K01n742u_001:6590: bhikṣur api saha-śayyāṃ kalpayati vinayāti-kramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:6592: yā puna bhikṣuṇī saha-śayyāṃ kalpayet pācattikaṃ ||3 ||
K01n742u_001:6596: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī sāṃghike vihāre śayyāsanaṃ rundhitvā cārikāṃ prakrāntā |
K01n742u_001:6598: tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo yathā-vṛddhikāya utthāpīyanti tasmin vihāre sāṃghikaṃ śayyāsanaṃ |
K01n742u_001:6600: kim asya dāni sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanaṃ ni[ru]ndhiya cārikāṃ prakramīyati |
K01n742u_001:6602: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:6605: etad eva pṛcchiyati yāvad āma bhagavan |
K01n742u_001:6607: duṣkṛtaṃ te nande evaṃ ca nāma tvaṃ sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanaṃ aniḥsaritvā cārikāṃ prakaramasi |
K01n742u_001:6608: tena hi na kṣamati sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanam aniḥsarivtā cārikāṃ prakramituṃ |
K01n742u_001:6609: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti |
K01n742u_001:6610: yā puna bhikṣuṇī sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanam aniḥsaritvā cārikāṃ prakrāmeya pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:6612: sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanan ti mañcam vā pīṭham vā bisikām vā catur-asrakām vā kuccam vā bimbohanam vā |
K01n742u_001:6614: cārikāṃ prakrameyā ti anyatra gacchet pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ |
K01n742u_001:6615: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīye sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanam aniḥsaritvā cārikāṃ prakramituṃ |

K01n742u_001:6957: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya sa-puruṣam āvāsam andhakāre apradīpikāya upasaṃkramituṃ |
K01n742u_001:6958: atha dāni kiñcit kāryaṃ bhavati yadi tahiṃ ucca-śabdo bhavati praviśaty an-āpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:6959: atha dāni agnir na bhavati pratisaṃvedayitavyo |
K01n742u_001:6962: sa eṣā bhikṣuṇī naiva pratisaṃvedayati nācchaṭikāṃ karoti upasaṃkramati pācattikam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:6963: bhikṣur api sa-strīkam āvāsam andhakāre apratisaṃvidito upasaṃkramati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:6965: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī sa-puruṣam āvāsam andhakāre apradīpikā upasaṃkrameya pācattikaṃ ||
K01n742u_001:6969: tāyo dāni ṣaḍ-vargiṇo bhikṣuṇīyo giry-agra-samājaṃ gacchanti |
K01n742u_001:6970: tā dāni tahiṃ gatvā pṛthag mañca gṛhṇanti naṭo nāṭayati sa-prahāsaṃ vastu-padā nāṭitam bhavati |
K01n742u_001:6972: tāyo dāni tūṣṇīkās tiṣṭhanti yogācarā iva |
K01n742u_001:6973: yadā praśāntam bhavati nāṭakam avatāritaṃ bhavati |
K01n742u_001:6978: te dāni vi-cakṣu kṛtā nelāṭikaṃ na prayacchanti |
K01n742u_001:6981: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:6983: tena hi na kṣamati viśoka-darśanāya gantuṃ |
K01n742u_001:6984: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti |
K01n742u_001:6985: yā punar bhikṣuṇī viśoka-darśanāya gacchet pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:6987: vi-śokam iti naṭa-nartanakasalla-malla-pāṇi-svarikāḥ kumbha-bhūmīrāḥ antamasato yahiṃ catvāro pi janāḥ sannipatanti krīḍyārthaṃ tahiṃ darśanāya gacchanti |
K01n742u_001:6990: atha dāni bhikṣuṇī piṇḍacāram aṇvati paśyati deva-yānaṃ niṣkramantaṃ rājño'ntaḥpuraṃ niṣkrāntaṃ dāni śakyam akṣīṇi nimīlayituṃ kiñcāpi paśyati an-āpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:6991: atha dāni ābhogaṃ karoti ime paśyāmi ito paśyāmīti pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:6992: atha dāni bhagavato mālyāropaṇaṃ bhavati upāsakopāsikā āhaṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:6995: atha dāni tahiṃ kocic cittasya vikāro bhavati na kṣamati sthātuṃ |
K01n742u_001:6996: bhikṣur api viśoka-darśanāya gacchati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:6998: yā puna bhikṣuṇī viśoka-darśanāya gacchet pācattikaṃ ||
K01n742u_001:7002: atha khalu mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhikṣuṇīnāṃ kalaha-jātānāṃ bhaṇḍana-jātānāṃ vigrahavivādam āpannānāṃ viharantīnāṃ vṛṣabhī samānā adhikaraṇāni na vyupaśamayati na vyupaśamāpayati na vyupaśamanāyautsukyaṃ karoti |
K01n742u_001:7007: evaṃ nāma tvaṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ kalaha-jātānāṃ bhaṇḍana-jātānāṃ vigraha-vivādam āpannānāṃ vṛṣabhī samānā [adhikaraṇāni] na vyupasamayasi na vyupasamāpayasi na vyupasamanāyautsukyaṃ karosi |
K01n742u_001:7010: yā puna [bhikṣuṇī] bhikṣuṇīnāṃ kalaha-jātānāṃ bhaṇḍana-jātānāṃ vigraha-vivādam āpannānāṃ viharantīnāṃ [vṛṣabhī samanā] adhikaraṇāni na vyupaśamayen na vyupa-samāpayen na vyupasamanāyautsukhyaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7012: kalaha-jātānām iti vācā-kalahaṃ kurvantīnāṃ vāta-yuktaṃ mama yuktam ity ādi |
K01n742u_001:7013: bhaṇḍana-jātānām iti anyamanyaṃ mama ghaṭanaṃ kurvantīnāṃ |
K01n742u_001:7017: gurukā laghukā sa-pratikarmā a-pratikarmā sāvaśeṣā nir-avaśeṣā |
K01n742u_001:7018: dharma-karma a-dharma-karma samagra-karma vyagra-karma yāvat sthānārhaṃ karma iti viharantīnāṃ |
K01n742u_001:7022: na vyupasamānāyautsukyaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ |
K01n742u_001:7023: etam(etā) dāni bhikṣuṇīyo kalaha-jātā bhaṇḍana-jātā vigraha-vivādam āpannā viharanti na dāni kṣamati tāyo adyupekṣituṃ |
K01n742u_001:7025: autsukyaṃ kartavyaṃ upasamanāya pratyāśaṃsitavyaṃ parasparaṃ kṣamāpayitavyāḥ prāpta-kālaṃ yathārūpaṃ paribhāṣayitavyāḥ samagrīkartvyāḥ |
K01n742u_001:7026: atha dāni na śaknoti anyā bhikṣuṇī adhyesitavyā udyojayitavyā upāsakopāsikāyo bhikṣu-bhikṣuṇīyo |
K01n742u_001:7027: atha tāny adhikaraṇāni karkkaśāni bhavanti dur-vyupasamāni teṣām eva adhikaraṇānāṃ kālam āgamayati samayam āgamayati paripākam āgamayati |
K01n742u_001:7028: kālaṃ ca samayam ca paripākaṃ cāgamya vyupaśamayaty anāpattiḥ bhikṣur api bhikṣūṇāṃ kalaha-jātānāṃ bhaṇḍaṇa-jātānāṃ vigraha-vivādam āpannānām viharantānāṃ vṛṣabho samāno adhikaraṇāni na vyupaśamayati na vyupasamāpayati na vyupasamānāyautsukyaṃ karoti vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:7030: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīnāṃ kalaha-jātānāṃ bhaṇḍana-jātānāṃ vigraha-vivādam āpannānāṃ viharantīnāṃ vṛṣabhī samānā adhikaraṇāni na vyupasamayen na [vyupasamāpayen] na vyupasamānāyautsukyaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ ||3 ||
K01n742u_001:7034: bhadrā dāni kāpileyī jñāti-kulaṃ nīyate udvartanāya snāpanāya gṛha-patinīhi nīyate |
K01n742u_001:7035: vayam āryām udvartayāmaḥ snāpayiṣyāmaḥ asmākaṃ puṇyaṃ bhaviṣyati |
K01n742u_001:7039: varṇa-lolāṃ udvartayanti kāleyakena tuṃgeyakena svaṅgakena padmakena gandhacūrṇehi |
K01n742u_001:7043: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ | pe |
K01n742u_001:7047: evan nāma tvaṃ gṛhiṇīnām udvartnaparimardana-snāpana-sammatena udvartāpayasi |
K01n742u_001:7049: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti |
K01n742u_001:7050: yāni khalu punar imāni gṛhiṇīnām udvartana-parimardana-snāpanasammatāni tathārūpehi bhikṣuṇī a-gilānā udvartāpayet parimardāpayet pācattikaṃ
K01n742u_001:7051: yāni khalu [pu]nar imāni gṛhiṇīnam iti kṣatriya-kanyakānāṃ brāhmaṇa-kanyakānāṃ gṛhapati-kanyakānāṃ |
K01n742u_001:7052: udvartana-parimardana-snāpana-sammatānīti kāleyakam vā tuṃgeyakam vā cikkasam vā |
K01n742u_001:7053: yady eko vā tehi bhikṣuṇīhi a-gilānā udvartāpayet |
K01n742u_001:7054: kin tāvad atra gailānyam abhipretaṃ jarā-durbalā vā vyādhidurbalā vā bhavati udvartāpayaty an-āpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:7056: atha dāni gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā bhavati labhyā bhaiṣajyehi udvartāpayituṃ parimardāpayituṃ |
K01n742u_001:7057: atha dāni pittasaṃkṣobho bhavati labhyā cikkasenāliṃpituṃ |
K01n742u_001:7058: atha dāni vāta-saṃkṣobho bhavati labhyā go-dhūma-cikkasenāliṃpituṃ |
K01n742u_001:7059: atha dāni sannipāto bhavati saṃyuktehi bhaiṣajyehi udvartāpayitavyaṃ parimardāpayitavyaṃ āliṃpitavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7060: tāya pi dāni āliṃpiya na kṣamati abhyāgame pradeśe sthātuṃ |
K01n742u_001:7064: bhikṣur api a-gilāno cikkasenodvartāpayet parimardāpayed vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:7066: yā puna bhikṣuṇī gṛhiṇīnām udvartana-parimardana-snāna-sammatehi udvartāpayeta parimardāpayeta pācattikaṃ ||
K01n742u_001:7070: bhagavatā dāni śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ na kṣamati gṛhiṇīnām udvartana-parimardana-snāna-sam-matehi udvartāpayituṃ parimardāpayituṃ |
K01n742u_001:7076: yā puna bhikṣuṇī a-gilānā bhikṣuṇīya udvartāpayet parimardāpayet pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7079: a-gilānā ti kin tāvad atra gailānyam abhipretaṃ jarā-durbalā vā vyādhi-durbalā vā bhoti |
K01n742u_001:7082: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī a-gilānā bhikṣuṇīya udvartāpayati na parimardāpayati vinayātikramaḥ |
K01n742u_001:7086: bhikṣur api a-gilāno bhikṣuṇā udvartāpayati parimardāpayati vinayātikramaḥ |
K01n742u_001:7088: yā puna bhikṣuṇī a-gilānā bhikṣuṇīya udvartāpayet parimardāpayet pācattikaṃ || phu ||
K01n742u_001:7093: yā puna bhikṣuṇī a-gilānā śrāmaṇerīya udvartāpayet parimardāpayet pācattikaṃ || phu ||
K01n742u_001:7097: śikṣamāṇā nāma aṣṭādaśahi vartehi dve varṣāṇi śikṣamāṇā yāvat |
K01n742u_001:7099: yā puna bhikṣuṇī a-gilānā śikṣamāṇāya udvartāpayet [parimardāpayet] pācattikaṃ ||grā ||
K01n742u_001:7106: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā gṛhiṇīya udvartāpayet parimardāpayet pācattikaṃ || hrā ||
K01n742u_001:7117: yāvatikā kā viśuddhā ahan tāsām anyatamāsāṃ tatra nāgacchati(cchāmi) |
K01n742u_001:7118: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ | pe |
K01n742u_001:7123: tvañ ca nāma poṣadhan na satkaroṣi |
K01n742u_001:7124: kā anyā satkariṣyati ko ca poṣadhasya satkāro |
K01n742u_001:7127: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti |
K01n742u_001:7128: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anvardha-māsaṃ[a-gilānā] viśuddhi-saṃvāsaṃ na satkareya pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7130: anvardha-māsaṃ viśuddhisaṃvāsaṃ ti cāturdaśikena vā cāturdaśikaṃ yāva(pāñca)
K01n742u_001:7134: eṣā bhavati jarā-durbalā vā vyādhi-durbalā vā śirā-viddhikā vā bhavati a-sukhā bhaiṣajyaṃ vā pītam bhavati |
K01n742u_001:7137: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī a-gilānā poṣadhan na gacchati |
K01n742u_001:7138: gilānā vā chandan na deti pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7139: bhikṣur api a-gilāno naiva poṣadhaṃ gacchati na cchandan deti vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:7141: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anvardhamāsaṃ a-gilānā viśuddhisaṃvāsan na satkareya pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7158: te dāni āyuṣmanto ṣaḍ-vargikāḥ ovādaka-vāraṃ na labhanti |
K01n742u_001:7163: āyuṣmāṃ cchāriputraḥ sa khilo ca mṛduko ca |
K01n742u_001:7165: na kṣamati a-sammatena bhikṣuṇā bhikṣuṇīyo ovadituṃ |
K01n742u_001:7167: te dāni niḥ-sīmaṃ gatvā anyamanyaṃ saṃmanyitvā kalyato yeva nivāsayitvā prāvaritvā ca bhikṣuṇī -upāśrayaṃ gatvā āhaṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:7170: yāyo yogācārāyo bhikṣuṇīyo tāyo na sannipatanti |
K01n742u_001:7172: kim artham vayam eṣām a-vinītānām avavādaṃ gamiṣyāmaḥ |
K01n742u_001:7173: te dāni tāhi saha muhūrtam antaraṃ kāka-vaṃhā bhañjitvā gatāḥ |
K01n742u_001:7174: āyuṣmān dāni śāriputro kālasyaiva nivāsayitvā pātra-cīvaram ādāya āyuṣmatā ānandena paścāc chramaṇena sārdhaṃ vistareṇa |
K01n742u_001:7188: ovaditā vayam āryamiśrakehi ṣaḍ-vargikehi anya-vihitakena ovādena |
K01n742u_001:7189: athāyuṣmān śāriputro vyagro bhikṣuṇī-saṃgho ti kṛtvā utthāyāsanāto prakrānto |
K01n742u_001:7190: bhagavān jānanto yeva pṛcchati kin dāni gautamī mātā śīghram āgato si |
K01n742u_001:7193: ahaṃ bhagavan kālasyaiva nivāsayitvā yāvad bhikṣuṇī-upāśrayaṃ praviṣṭo ovadituṃ mayoktaṃ sannipatatha bhaginīyo ovādo bhaviṣyati |
K01n742u_001:7195: yāyo ṣaḍ-vargiṇīyo bhikṣuṇīyo tā na sannipatanti |
K01n742u_001:7204: na vayam āgamiṣyāmaḥ ovaditā vayam āryamiśrikehi ṣaḍ-vargikehi anya-vidi(hi)
K01n742u_001:7206: ahaṃ pi bhagavan vyagro bhikṣuṇī-saṃgho ti kṛtvā utthāyāsanāto sannirgato |
K01n742u_001:7210: tad eva sarvaṃ bhagavān vistareṇa pṛcchati |
K01n742u_001:7213: duṣkṛtaṃ vo ṣaḍ-vargiṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhavanti |
K01n742u_001:7214: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anvardha māsaṃ bhikṣu-saṃghe ovādopasaṃ-kramaṇaṃ na satkareya pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7218: bhikṣusaṃghe ovadopasaṃkramaṇaṃ na satkareya pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ |
K01n742u_001:7219: atha dāni jarā-durbalā vā vyādhi-durbalā vā ghṛta-pītikā vā bhavati vaktavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7221: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī a-gilānā ovādopasaṃkramaṇaṃ na gacchati gilānā vā chandan na deti pācattikam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:7222: yadā poṣadho bhavati tadā cchanda-hārikāhi bhikṣu-vihāraṅ gatvā vaktavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7223: samagro bhikṣuṇī-saṃgho samagrasya bhikṣu-saṃghasya pādāṃ cchirasā vandati poṣadhañ ca pratīcchati avavādaṃ ca yācati evaṃ trikkhatto yācitavyaṃ
K01n742u_001:7224: yadi tāvat kocid bhikṣuṇī-ovādako bhavati vaktavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7226: atha na kocid bhavati yo taṃhi aṅgopeto bhavati so saṃmanyitavyo |
K01n742u_001:7228: nāsti bhaginīyo bhikṣuṇī-ovādako apramādena saṃpādetha āpattiñ ca poṣadhaṃ pratijāgratha sa-gauravā ca bhavatha sthavirehi bhikṣūhi madhyehi navakehīti |
K01n742u_001:7230: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anvardha-māsaṃ viśuddhi-poṣadhaṃ na satkareya pācattikaṃ ||
K01n742u_001:7234: jetāye bhikṣuṇīye saṃbādhe pradeśe gaṇḍam utpannaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7241: so dāni pāṭayitvā dhovāyitvā upanāhayitvā gato |
K01n742u_001:7243: tāhi dāni so pradeśo dṛṣṭo pūyamrakṣito |
K01n742u_001:7249: sāhasam āryāya kṛtaṃ saṃbādhe pradeśe śastrakarma kārayantīya |
K01n742u_001:7250: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye [ārocayeṃ]suḥ | pe |
K01n742u_001:7254: evaṃ ca nāma tvaṃ upari jānu-maṇḍalābhyāṃ adho kakṣābhyāṃ gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā upahatam vā akṛtvā pūrva-kṛtyaṃ an-avalokayitvā saṃghaṃ śastra-karma kārāpayasi |
K01n742u_001:7257: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upari jānu-maṇḍalābhyām adho kakṣābhyāṃ gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā upahatam vā akṛtvā pūrva-kṛtyaṃ an-avalokayitvā saṃghaṃ puruṣeṇa pātāpayed vā dhovāpayed vā [upanāhāpayed vā ] pācattikaṃ ||
K01n742u_001:7261: gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā upahatam vā akṛtvā pūrva-kṛtyan ti bhikṣuṇī vaktavyo śastra-karma kārāpayiṣyan ti |
K01n742u_001:7262: an-avalokayitvā saṃghā ti saṃgha-madhye avalokanā kartavyā |
K01n742u_001:7263: śṛṇotu me āryā saṃgho yadi saṃghasya prāpta-kālaṃ itthan-nāmā bhikṣuṇī śastra-karma kārāpeya |
K01n742u_001:7264: kārāpayiṣyati āryā saṃgho itthan-nāmā bhikṣuṇī śastra-karma |
K01n742u_001:7265: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi |
K01n742u_001:7266: puruṣeṇeti gṛhasthena vā pravrajitena vā pāṭāpayed vā dhovāpayed vā upanāhāpeya vā ti yathā jetā bhikṣuṇīti pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ |
K01n742u_001:7267: atha dāni saṃbādhe pradeśe gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā upahatam vā bhavati antevāsinīye vā samānopādhyāyinīye vā samānācāryāye vā yasyā viśvāso tāya ākhyātavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7269: dāpayitavyaṃ bhaiṣajyena vā ālimpāpeyatavyaṃ atha dāni adho jānu-maṇḍalābhyām upari kakṣābhyām bhavati gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā puruṣeṇa
K01n742u_001:7270: ṭāpayati vā dhovāpayati vā upanā[hāpa]yati vā evam śirām vā vedhāpayati nelāṭikam vā bāhu-śirām vā gulpha-śirām vā aparāya bhikṣuṇīya ākramitavyā tena bhagavān āha |
K01n742u_001:7271: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upari jānu-maṇḍalābhyāṃ adho kakṣābhyāṃ gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā upahatam vā akṛtvā pūrva-kṛtyaṃ an-avalokayitvā saṃghaṃ puruṣeṇa pāṭāpayed vā dhovāpayed vā upanāhāpayed vā pācattikaṃ ||
K01n742u_001:7275: atha kālī nāma bhikṣuṇī varṣopagatā sāṃghikaṃ vihāraṃ bandhitvā cārikāṃ prakrāntāḥ |
K01n742u_001:7276: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ | pe |
K01n742u_001:7280: duṣkṛtam te kāli evan nāma tvaṃ varṣopagatānāṃ cārikāṃ prakramasi |
K01n742u_001:7281: tena hi na kṣamati varṣopagatāya cārikāṃ prakramituṃ |
K01n742u_001:7282: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti |
K01n742u_001:7283: yā puna bhikṣuṇī varṣopagatā cārikāṃ prakrāmeya pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7286: upagatā ti purimikāṃ paścimikām vā varṣopanāmayikāṃ upagatā |
K01n742u_001:7287: cārikāṃ prakrāmeyā ti anyatra gaccheya grāmāntaraṃ pi pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ |
K01n742u_001:7288: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī eka-rātram pi vipravasati pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7289: atha dāni rāja-bhayam vā senā-bhayam vā para-cakra-bhayam vā jīvitāntarāyo vā brahmacaryāntarāyo vā bhaveya kiñcāpi gacchati anāpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:7290: nāsti bhikṣuṇyā avalokanā-karma saptāhaṃ vā kiñcāpi bhikuḥ avalokanā-karma kṛtvā saptāhaṃ vā adhiṣṭhiheya gacchaty anāpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:7292: yā puna bhikṣuṇī varṣopagatā cārikāṃ prakrameya pācattikaṃ ||3 ||
K01n742u_001:7296: bhikṣuṇīyo dāni śrāvastīyaṃ varṣoṣitāḥ vaiśālīm āgatāḥ |
K01n742u_001:7305: idṛśī ca idṛśī ca evam ārāma-ramaṇīyā |
K01n742u_001:7311: yadi pravrajyā eṣā pravrajyā iyaṃ punar asmākam ārya-dhītā ihaiva jātā |
K01n742u_001:7313: naiva kahiṃci gacchati kūpa-maṇḍūka iva tiṣṭhati a-niḥkramā |
K01n742u_001:7314: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:7316: tena hi varṣā-vustāyā bhikṣuṇīya cārikā prakramitavyā |
K01n742u_001:7318: yā puna bhikṣuṇī varṣā-vustā cārikāṃ na prakrameya pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7320: varṣoṣiteti vārṣikāṃ trayo māsān cārikāṃ na prakrameyā ti antamasato grāmāntaraṃ pi vā pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ |
K01n742u_001:7321: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī evaṃ rātraṃ pi prakramati pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7322: atha dāni jarā-durbalā vā vyādhi-durbalā vā bhoti na pratibalā gantuṃ kiñcāpi gacchati an-āpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:7323: bhikṣur api varṣā-vusto cārikāṃ na prakramati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:7325: yā puna bhikṣuṇī varṣā-vustā cārikāṃ na prakrameya pācattikaṃ || ṇka ||
K01n742u_001:7329: sthūla-nandāya bhikṣuṇīya jetā bhikṣuṇī rājagṛhaṃ gacchamānī nivāritā |
K01n742u_001:7330: ihāryāya varṣā vasitavyā tāya sā kulehi samvarṇitā |
K01n742u_001:7331: āryā jetā bhadrikā guṇavatī anubaddhā tā saṃvṛtā ca |
K01n742u_001:7332: etāya adhikāraṃ karotha sā dāni kulāni upasaṃkramati prāsādikena atikrāntena pratikrāntena avalokitena vyavalokitena sammiñjita-prasāritena saṃghāṭī-pātra-cīvara-dhāraṇena anubaddhā an-unnaḍā a-capalā a-mukharā a-prakīrṇa-vācā |
K01n742u_001:7335: pratyālapanti pratyutthihenti nimantrayanti pātreṇa cīvareṇa glāna-pratyaya-bhaiṣajya pariṣkārehi |
K01n742u_001:7336: sthūlanandā bhikṣuṇi an-ākalpa-saṃpannā an-īryāpatha-sampannā omalina-malinehi cīvarehi pāṭita-vipāṭitehi vaḍḍa-ḍiṅgara-puṣṭālaṃbehi stanehi vaḍḍhehi sphicakehi uddhatā unnaḍā capalā mukharā prakīrṇavācā |
K01n742u_001:7337: te tasyā na gauravaṃ kurvanti na nimantrayanti |
K01n742u_001:7338: sā dāni tāṃ udvahati kāyena vācā |
K01n742u_001:7339: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:7341: śabdāpayatha nandāṃ sā dāni śabdāpitā tad eva sarvaṃ pṛcchīyatīti yāvad āma bhagavan |
K01n742u_001:7342: bhagavān āha duṣkṛtaṃ te nande yāvat |
K01n742u_001:7343: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīm evam uktvā ihārye varṣaṃ vasitavyaṃ ity uktvā paścād udvaheya vā udvahāpeya vā pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7345: bhikṣuṇīm evam vade ihārye varṣāṃ vasitavyam iti trayo māsāṃ uktveti nivārayitvā paścād udvaheya vā ti kāyena vā vācā vā svayaṃ udvahati |
K01n742u_001:7346: udvāhāpeya vā ti pareṇa kāyena vā vācāya pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7348: na kṣamati nivārayitvā paścād udvahituṃ atha bhavati śithilikā vā bāhulikā vā a-śikṣā-kāmā vā kalaha-kārikā vā paśyati yadīha vaśiṣyati āśrayam utpādayiṣyatīti |
K01n742u_001:7350: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīm udvahati pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7351: śrāmaṇerīm vā śikṣamāṇāṃ vā udvahati vinayātikramaḥ |
K01n742u_001:7352: antamasato gṛhiṇī pi udvahati samvara-gāmī-vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:7353: yā puna bhikṣuṇī yevam vaditvā ihārye varṣam vasitavyan ti uktvā paścād udvaheya vā udvahāpeya vā pācattikaṃ || tṛ ||
K01n742u_001:7361: tatra ca bhikṣuṇīhi vihāroddeśaḥ śayanāsanoddeśaḥ kṛtaḥ |
K01n742u_001:7373: sā kāṣṭha-khaṇḍā ti yatra śākhāni praveśayati |
K01n742u_001:7377: bhadrāyaṇi kin tvayā vihāro kṛto kim vikrīto |
K01n742u_001:7378: sāṃghiko vihāro kim arthaṃ na praveśayiṣyam |
K01n742u_001:7380: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:7381: yāvat śabdāpayatha kāliṃ sā dāni śabdāpitā |
K01n742u_001:7386: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī bhikṣuṇīṃ pūrvopagatāṃ paścād āgatvā udvaheya vā udvahāpeya vā kāyena vā vācāya vā pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7388: jānantīti svayaṃ vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya |
K01n742u_001:7393: vā ti pareṇa kāyeṇa vā vācā vā pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ |
K01n742u_001:7395: śrāmaṇerīm vā śikṣamāṇām vā udvahati deśanā-gāmi-vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:7398: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī bhikṣuṇīṃ pūrvopagatāṃ paścād āgatvā udvaheya vā udvahāpeya vā kāyena vā vācā vā pācattikaṃ || phu ||
K01n742u_001:7404: tahiṃ dāni aparo brāhmaṇo śīrṣa-snāto āhata-vastra-nivastro tāya rathyāya atikramati |
K01n742u_001:7407: janena copahāsitaṃ brāhmaṇa su-snātaḥ su-viliptas tvam iti |
K01n742u_001:7410: iti-kitikāya dhīte śramaṇike na paśyasi mama śīrṣaṃ vastrāṇi ca viṣṭhena vināsi(śi)tāni |
K01n742u_001:7411: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ | pe |
K01n742u_001:7415: duskṛtan te evan nāma tvam apratyavekṣiya choresi |
K01n742u_001:7416: tena hi na kṣamati apratyavekṣiya chorayituṃ |
K01n742u_001:7417: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti |
K01n742u_001:7418: yā puna bhikṣuṇī tiro-kuḍyaṃ uccāram vā prāsrāvam vā kheṭakam vā siṃghāṇakam vā vighasam vā saṃka(kā)
K01n742u_001:7421: tiro-kuḍyan ti tiraḥ-prakāram uccāram vā prasrāvam vā kheṭam vā siṃghāṇakam vā vighasam vā saṃkāram vā vastra-dhovanam vā bhāṇḍa-dhovanam vā keśān vā nakhān vā |
K01n742u_001:7426: yadi tāvad ākīrṇa-bahu-jana-manuṣyā rathyā bhavanti ārāmayitavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7427: atha dāni an-ākīrṇā bhavanti kiñcāpi chorayaty an-āpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:7428: taṃ pi dāni na kṣamati a-śabda-karṇikāye chorayituṃ api tu acchaṭikā dātavyā ukkāsitavyam vā |
K01n742u_001:7429: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī naiva pratyavekṣati nāpi acchaṭikāṃ dattvā chorayati pācattikam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:7430: bhikṣur api apratyavekṣya acchaṭikām akṛtvā chorayati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:7432: yā puna bhikṣuṇī tiro-kuḍyaṃ uccāram vā prasrāvam vā kheṭaṃ vā siṃghāṇakam vā vighasam vā [saṃkāram vā ] apratyavekṣya choreya pācattikaṃ || grā ||
K01n742u_001:7437: rājño dāni prasenajitasya kośalasya pūrva-koṣṭhakaṃ nāma udyānam puṣkiriṇī-sampannaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7438: an-āvṛtaṃ bhikṣūnāṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ āvṛtaṃ itarāye janatāye |
K01n742u_001:7440: ho bhaṇe ārāmika pūrvakoṣṭhakam udyānaṃ siktasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ karehi |
K01n742u_001:7444: tāyo dāni pratikṛty eva gatvā tahiṃ harita-śādvalopastarāṇāyāṃ pakva-kheṭena ca pakva-siṃghāṇakena ca vināśayitvā paduma-patrehi uccārasya puṭakāni bandhitvā puṣkiriṇīyaṃ pravāhayeṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:7445: tāyo dāni divasaṃ tahiṃ kākā-vāhāṃ bhañjiya sāyāhna-samaye nagaraṃ praviṣṭāḥ rājā dāni prasenajita kośalo aparejjukāto niragato sāntaḥpuro |
K01n742u_001:7446: tāyo dāni antaḥpurikāyo kathaṃcid eva samrodhād avamuktā randhanamokṣam iva manyamānāḥ caṃcūryante |
K01n742u_001:7448: kāścid ito ca ito ca dhāvanti avakāsaṃ (śaṃ)
K01n742u_001:7450: tāsāṃ dāni pakva-kheṭena pakvasiṃghāṇakena vastrāṇi vināśitāni |
K01n742u_001:7453: tāsāṃ bhavati kula-putrakehi śrutaṃ śvo rājā śā(sā)
K01n742u_001:7454: ntaḥpuro udyānaṃ pravekṣyatīti tehi ete gandha-puṭakāḥ pravāhitā iti kṛtvā tāyo gṛhṇanti |
K01n742u_001:7455: te udakena klinnā uccāreṇa cā khāditāḥ prakṛti-sukumāraṃ ca padma-patraṃ |
K01n742u_001:7457: hī hī viṣṭhaṃ tā dāni rājño upasaṃkrāntā āhaṃsu |
K01n742u_001:7458: mahārāja eṣa tāvad īdṛśī avasthā rājā āha śabdāpayatha ārāmikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7461: ho bhaṇe ārāmika kena udyānaṃ viṭṭālitaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7462: āha ṣaḍ-vargiṇīyo śramaṇīyo eva divasaṃ kāya(ka)
K01n742u_001:7466: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:7467: mahāprajāpatī pi gautamī bhagavato ārocayet | yāvad
K01n742u_001:7468: yā puna bhikṣuṇī harite tṛṇe uccāram vā prasrāvam vā kheṭam vā siṃghāṇakam vā kuryāt pācattikaṃ ||
K01n742u_001:7469: yā puna bhikṣuṇī udake uccāram vā prasrāvam vā kheṭam vā siṃghāṇakam vā kuryāt pācattikaṃ ||
K01n742u_001:7475: harite tṛṇe iti śādvale acchinnālūnasmiṃ udan ti udakāni nāma daśa |
K01n742u_001:7476: nādikaṃ tāḍāgaṃ audupānikaṃ śvabhrodakaṃ praghārimaṃ vṛṣṭi-sthitaṃ ucchodakaṃ antarīkṣa-pānīyaṃ hima-vilīnaṃ sāmudram vā uccāram vā prasrāvaṃ vā kuryāt pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ |
K01n742u_001:7477: atha dāni prāvṛṣeṇyā se sarva-bhumiḥ śādvalopastareṇā bhavati yahiṃ pradeśe svalpa-haritam bhavati tahiṃ kartavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7478: atha dāni alpa-haritaṃ na bhavati kaṭāhake vā iṣṭakāyam vā upale vā śuṣka-tṛṇe vā kāṣṭhakhaṇḍe vā yatra vā anyena uccāro kṛto bhavati balīvardena vā |
K01n742u_001:7479: yatra vā anyena manuṣyena kṛto tahiṃ kartavyaṃ atha dāni evaṃ na bhavati antamasato kanīyasiṃ pi aṅguliṃ upadrāhayitvā kartavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7480: tathā kartavyaṃ yathā tahim prathamam nipatati |
K01n742u_001:7481: atha dāni caṃkramati na kṣamati harita-śādvale śleṣmaṃ chorayituṃ |
K01n742u_001:7482: atha khu kaṭe vā patrapuṭikāyāṃ vā chorayitavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7484: yā puna bhikṣuṇī harite tṛṇe uccāram vā prasrāvam vā kheṭam vā siṃghāṇakam vā kuryāt pācattikaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7485: yā puna bhikṣuṇī udake uccāram vā prasrāvam vā kheṭam vā siṃghāṇakam vā kuryāt pācattikaṃ ||
K01n742u_001:7491: prajāpati detha cchandakaṃ āryamiśrikāṇāṃ bhaktaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ |
K01n742u_001:7493: tā dān āhaṃsuḥ āryā yaṃ divasaṃ saṃgha-bhaktaṃ kariṣyatha tadāsmākam api ārocayetha |
K01n742u_001:7496: āyuṣmanto śāriputra-maudgalyāyanau aniruddho revataḥ kapphiṇo śroṇa-koṭī-viṃśa upavāno āyuṣmān rāhulo ṣaḍ-vargikāś ca |
K01n742u_001:7499: tahiṃ dāni bhikṣū kālasyaiva nivāsayitvā prāvaritvā ca praviṣṭāḥ |
K01n742u_001:7500: tato āyuṣmato śāriputrasya dātuṃ śālinā-m-odanaṃ mudgānāṃ sūpo ghṛtaṃ dadhi ca |
K01n742u_001:7501: āyuṣmato maudgalyāyanasya yavakodano māṣa-sūpo tailaṃ ca |
K01n742u_001:7504: apareṣāṃ vyañjanāni dinnāni odano na dīyate |
K01n742u_001:7505: apareṣāṃ śākaṃ dinnaṃ odano na dīyate |
K01n742u_001:7508: tā dāni striyo bhakṣya-bhojyam ādāya gatāḥ pṛcchanti |
K01n742u_001:7510: tāyo dāni sthavirān bhikṣūn āvaritvā ṣaḍ-vargikān darśenti |
K01n742u_001:7511: tatas teṣān dīyate śālinā -m-odanaṃ mudgānāṃ sūpo ghṛtaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7512: navanītaṃ ambu madhurāṇi gauḍan dadhi śvetaṃ dadhi kṣīraṃ samitāsamitaṃ yasyārthaṃ yāv arthaṃ dīyati |
K01n742u_001:7513: yat kiñcit praṇīta-sammataṃ bhakṣya-bhojyaṃ peyaṃ coṣmaṃ taṃ ṣaḍ-vargikāṇān dāpayanti |
K01n742u_001:7514: ime te āryamiśrikāḥ bhikṣū pi bhukta-vibhuktakāḥ utthāyotthāya bhagavataḥ pāda-vandā upasaṃkrāntā |
K01n742u_001:7516: api tu śāriputra śobhane māsi mṛṣṭam vā praṇītam vā prabhūtam vā |
K01n742u_001:7522: labdho bhagavan śālinā-m-odanaṃ mudgānāṃ sūpo navanītaṃ ambu madhurāṇi vyañjanani gauḍan dadhi kṣīraṃ yasyārthaṃ yāvad arthaṃ dīyati yathāpīdaṃ bhaginīnāṃ śraddhā-prasannānāṃ parigrahe |
K01n742u_001:7530: durbhuktaṃ te śāriputra evaṃ ca nāma tvaṃ bhikṣu-saṃghaṃ viheṭhayantaṃ adhyupekṣasi |
K01n742u_001:7531: yasya bhagavān durbhuktam ity āha tasya taṃ kalpam vā kalpāvaśeṣam vā tiṣṭheya naiva jarā gaccheya |
K01n742u_001:7532: sthavireṇa kāka-poṭaṃ dattvā sarva daradarāya vāntaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7538: bhagavān āha duṣkṛtaṃ vo bhikṣuṇīyo evam ca nāma yūyaṃ jānantīyo gaṇa-lābhaṃ gaṇasya pariṇāmayatha |
K01n742u_001:7540: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti |
K01n742u_001:7541: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī gaṇa-lābhaṃ gaṇasya pariṇataṃ gaṇasya pariṇāmayet pācattikam |
K01n742u_001:7543: jānantīti svayam vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya |
K01n742u_001:7545: lābham iti aṣṭa lābhāḥ yāvat kāliko yāma-yāmiko yāvat kalpikākalpiko pariṇatan ti pariniṣpannaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7547: eṣa dāni kocid āgacchati deya-dharmaṃ dātu-kāmo |
