K01n742u_001:7554: paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇo gautamo 'nekaparyāyeṇālpecchatāya varṇavādī yāvac chikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7555: tasmād iha gautami bhikṣuṇībhir avi atraiva śikṣitavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7557: ekam idam gautami samayaṃ tathāgato śākyeṣu viharati |
K01n742u_001:7559: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti |
K01n742u_001:7560: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ātmārthāya agilānā kulehi sarpiṃ vijñāpetvā vā vijñāpāyetvā vā khādeya vā bhuñjeya vā pratideśayitavyaṃ tāya bhikṣuṇīya asaṃpreyam me āryamiśrikā prātideśanikaṃ dharmam āpannā tan dharmaṃ pratideśayāmi |
K01n742u_001:7571: agilānā ti pratyuddhṛtaṃ bhagavatā padaṃ an-āpatti gilānāya |
K01n742u_001:7573: jarā-durbalā vā vyādhi-durbalā tā virecana-pītā vā śirā-viddhā vā śleṣmā vā sannipātā vā |
K01n742u_001:7574: kulehīti kṣatriya-kulāni vā brāhmaṇa-kulāni vā yāni vā punar anyāny api kānicit kulāni |
K01n742u_001:7575: sarpīti sarpin nāma gāviya māhiṣīye ajāye eḍakāya uṣṭrīya |
K01n742u_001:7580: pratideśayitavyaṃ tāya bhikṣuṇīya yāvad ayam dharmo prātideśaniko |
K01n742u_001:7581: atha dāni pitta-saṃkṣobho bhavati labhyā sarpi vijñāpetuṃ peyālaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7582: atha dāni piṇḍa-pātam aṇvanti paśyati ghṛtaṃ vikrāyantaṃ na dāni vaktavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7589: artho āryāya sarpiṇā yady arthikā bhoti |
K01n742u_001:7591: yadi pūraṃ pi pātraṃ labhati an-āpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:7592: atha dāni aparā pi kācid bhavati labhyā pratyutpannaprāyeṇa (!)
K01n742u_001:7595: yadi vāta-vikāro bhavati labhyā tailaṃ vijñapayituṃ taṃ pi dāni na taila-pīḍakānāṃ tena vijñapayitavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7596: atha dāni piṇḍa-cāram aṇvanti paśyati tailaṃ māpiyantaṃ yāvat pūraṃ pi pātraṃ labhati an-āpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:7597: yāvat labhyā pratyutpanna-prayogeṇa vaktuṃ imāye pi dehīti |
K01n742u_001:7598: evaṃ madhu | yadi śleṣma-vikāro bhavati labhyaṃ madhu vijñapayituṃ |
K01n742u_001:7599: taṃ pi dāni nā kṣamati madhu-ghātakānāṃ tena vijñapayituṃ |
K01n742u_001:7601: yadi gilānā bhavati vaidyo āha ārye guḍa-pra-yogaṃ karohīti labhyaṃ guḍaṃ vijñapayituṃ |
K01n742u_001:7604: atha dāni piṇḍacāram aṇvati paśyati yo kulehi gāvo duhyantāṃ na dāni vaktavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7611: artho āryāye dugdhenāpūram pi pātraṃ pratīcchaty an-āpattiḥ yāvat pratyutpannaprayogena labhyā vaktuṃ imāya pi dehīti |
K01n742u_001:7619: vaidyo āha dadhikṛtyaṃ karohīti labhyaṃ dadhi vijñapayituṃ |
K01n742u_001:7620: atha dāni piṇḍa-cāram aṇvati paśyati dadhi māpīyamānaṃ labhyā mastu vijñapayituṃ |
K01n742u_001:7625: atha dāni bhikṣuṇī vamanaṃ virecanaṃ vā kartukāmo (mā)
K01n742u_001:7626: bhavati vaidyo jalpati ārye abhiṣyandehi matsya-rasehīti |
K01n742u_001:7628: atha dāni piṇḍa-cāram aṇvati labhyaṃ āmbūkāṃjikaṃ vijñapayituṃ |
K01n742u_001:7635: atha dāni piṇḍa-cāram aṇvati labhyaṃ śāka-rasaṃ vijñapayituṃ |
K01n742u_001:7641: atha dāni jānāti amukasmiṃ kāle kadācid gailānyaṃ bhaviṣyati imāni bhaiṣajyāni durlabhāni bhaviṣyantīti pra[ti]kṛty eva yācati an-āpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:7652: yāni kho punar imāni praṇīta-sammatāni bhojanāni bhavanti sayyath' īdaṃ sarpiḥ evaṃ-rūpaṃ taṃ bhikṣuṇī agilānā kulehi vijñapetvā vā vijñāpāyetvā vā khādeya vā bhuṃjeya vā pratideśayitavyaṃ tāya bhikṣuṇīya |
K01n742u_001:7653: asaṃpreyam me ārye gārhyaṃ prātideśanikaṃ dharmam āpannā taṃ dharmaṃ prati-deśayāmi |
K01n742u_001:7657: yāni kho punar imāni praṇīta-sammatāni bhojanāni bhavanti sayyath' īdaṃ māṃsaṃ evaṃ-rūpaṃ bhikṣuṇī agilānā kulehi vijñapetvā vā vijñapāyetvā vā khādeya vā bhuñjeya vā prati-deśayitavyaṃ tāya bhikṣuṇīya |
K01n742u_001:7658: asaṃpreyam me ārye gārhyaṃ prātideśanikaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ vā tan dharmaṃ pratideśayāmi |
K01n742u_001:7670: 253. śaikṣā vistareṇa kartavyā yathā bhikṣuṇāṃ sarve ṣaḍ-vargāh sthāpayitvā haritodake |
K01n742u_001:7757: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo paścimaṃ prahāṇaṃ svastika-paryaṅkena niṣīdanti |
K01n742u_001:7758: athāparāye dāni bhikṣuṇīye vraṇa-mukhena dīrghako 'nu-srotena praviṣṭo |
K01n742u_001:7759: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:7762: gacchatha tāye amukaṃ bhaiṣajyaṃ detha tato so dīrghako niṣkramiṣyati |
K01n742u_001:7763: tāye dāni taṃ bhaiṣajyaṃ dinnaṃ pibanāye |
K01n742u_001:7764: so dīrghako anusrotam āgato na ca mṛto |
K01n742u_001:7766: evaṃ ca nāmā yūyaṃ svastika-paryaṅkena niṣīdatha |
K01n742u_001:7767: tena hi na kṣamati svastika-paryaṅkena niṣīdituṃ |
K01n742u_001:7770: atha khalv ekinā padena paryaṃko baddhavyaḥ |
K01n742u_001:7772: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī svastika-paryaṅkena niṣīdati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:7777: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo kaṭhine cīvaraṃ nikṣipiya sīvanti |
K01n742u_001:7778: aparāye bhikṣuṇīye vaṃsa-vidalikāya vraṇa-mukhena kṛtaṃ rudhiram utpāditaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7782: tena hi na kṣamati kaṭhine niṣīdituṃ |
K01n742u_001:7784: etā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo cīvara niṣīditu-kāmā bhavanti |
K01n742u_001:7786: atha khu upasthāna-śālāyām vā prāsāde vā prahāṇa-śālāyām vā ākārṣān dattvā cīvarakaṃ prajñapiya sīvitavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7788: pīṭhasya vā mañcasya vā upari prajñapayitvā sīvitavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7789: athaivaṃ pi na bhavati jānukānām upari sthāpayyitvā sīvitavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7790: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī kaṭhine niṣīdati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:7795: sthūlanandā dāni bhikṣuṇī saṃbahulāni strīhi sārdhaṃ nadīm ajirāvatīṅ gatvā ekānte cīvarakāṇī nikṣipiya snānāyāvatīrṇā |
K01n742u_001:7796: sā dāni pratikṛtyevottaritvā veṭhakena kāyaṃ veṭhayitvā strīṇām āha |
K01n742u_001:7800: kim punar āryāya muṇḍāya piṇḍilikāya etena kāryaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7804: yaṃ tāhi strīhi avadhyāpitaṃ taṃ dāni bhikṣuṇīhi śrutaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7809: duṣkṛtaṃ te nande yāvat tena hi na kṣamati veṭhakena kāyaṃ veṭhayituṃ |
K01n742u_001:7811: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī veṭhakena paṭṭakena vā kāyaṃ veṭhayati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:7812: atha dāni paṭṭikāya vā lohakena vā kāyaṃ veṭhayati |
K01n742u_001:7813: na kṣamati dvir api vellakaṃ trir api vellakaṃ veṭhayituṃ |
K01n742u_001:7815: atha dāni vātena pārśvaṃ gṛhītaṃ bhavati |
K01n742u_001:7816: gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā upahatam vā bhavati kiñcāpi paṭṭakena kāyaṃ veṭhayaty an-āpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:7822: sā pratikṛty' eva uttaritvā śroṇī-bhaṇḍakam ābandhitvā āha |
K01n742u_001:7823: prajāpatī prajāpati nidhyāyatha māṃ kim aham śobhāmi na śobhāmīti |
K01n742u_001:7828: bhagavān āha tena hi na kṣamati śroṇī-bhaṇḍaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7831: śaṃkhāvarttakā vā śirikā vā pīlukā vā vidrumā vā akṣarakṣā vā suvarṇa-rūpya-mayā vā maṇi-mayā vā prakālakā vā antamasato sūtra-maṇikā vā bandhati
K01n742u_001:7832: tena ca śroṇī-bhaṇḍaka-chandaṃ vinodayati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:7837: eṣaivārthotpattiḥ yāvad gṛhiṇī-bhaṇḍakam ābandhitvā yāvad bhagavān āha |
K01n742u_001:7852: yad vā punar anyad api kiñcid gṛhiṇī-bhāṇḍaṃ sarvan na kṣamati |
K01n742u_001:7853: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī gṛhiṇī-bhaṇḍakam ābandhayati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:7854: atha dāni bhaiṣajya-bhaṇḍakam ābandhati jvara-sūtrakam vā an-āpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:7859: tāyo dāni śākiya-kanyāyo kolita-kanyāyo malla-kanyāyo mahāntehi kulehi pravrajitā alaṃkārikāny ādāya |
K01n742u_001:7860: kumārikānāṃ vuhyantīnāṃ utsava-samaye tithi parvaṇyā deva-yātrādiṣu kṛtakāni bhāṇḍakāni dadantī |
K01n742u_001:7865: tena hi na kṣamati gṛhiṇī-alaṃkāraṃ dhārayituṃ |
K01n742u_001:7866: yadi kācid gṛhiṇī pravrajati yadi tāya kiñcid alaṃkāraṃ bhavati vaktavyā visarjehi |
K01n742u_001:7867: atha dāni paśyati durbhikṣa vā bhaveya piṇḍapāto vā na labhyeta jarā-durbalā vā bhavati vyādhi-durbalā vā gailānyam vā kiñcid bhaviṣyati alpa-lābho mātṛgrāmo mā vihanyeyā ti |
K01n742u_001:7869: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī alaṃkāram a-parityājayitvā pravrajeti vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:7875: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo śākīya-kanyāyo koliya-kanyāyo malla-kanyāyo mahā-kulehi [pravrajitā] ceṭikām ādāya pravrajanti |
K01n742u_001:7876: tāyo ceṭikāyo prāsādikāyo darśanīyāyo veśyaṃ (!) vāhayanti |
K01n742u_001:7882: evaṃ ca nāma yūyaṃ veśyām upasthāpayatha |
K01n742u_001:7885: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī veśyām upasthāpayati tena jīvikāṃ kalpayati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:7892: tāyo dāni śākiya-kanyāyo malla-kanyāyo kolita-kanyāyo mahā-kulehi pravrajanti |
K01n742u_001:7894: tāyo dāni ārāmikinīyo prāsādikāyo jano dāni ojjhāyati |
K01n742u_001:7896: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīhi śrutaṃ yāvad āma bhagavan |
K01n742u_001:7898: tena hi na kṣamati paudagalikām ārāmikinīm upasthāpayituṃ |
K01n742u_001:7909: tāye dāni pīnehi stanehi gacchantīya cīvaram utkṣipīyati |
K01n742u_001:7914: bhagavān āha tena saṃkakṣikā nāma kartavyā |
K01n742u_001:7915: samkakṣikāṃ prāvarantīya tathā prāvaritavyaṃ yathā dāni stanāpīḍitā bhavanti |
K01n742u_001:7916: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī saṃkakṣikān nopasthāpayati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:7917: santī na prāvarayati vinayātikramaḥ idam ucyate saṃkakṣikā-pratisaṃyuktaṃ || 0 ||
K01n742u_001:7923: tena hi na kṣamati nagnikāyā snātuṃ |
K01n742u_001:7926: na kṣamati nadīyam vā oghe vā puṣkiriṇīyam vā taḍāge vā nagnikāya snāpituṃ |
K01n742u_001:7929: atha dāni vihāre gupte pradeśe nagnikā snāyaty anāpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:7938: so manuṣyo puno puno śabdaṃ śṛṇoti |
K01n742u_001:7942: bhavatu āryaputra aham etaṃ jānāmi kin tavānena jñānena |
K01n742u_001:7946: etā āryamiśrikāyo brahmacāriṇīyo kāma-rāgena khajjantīyo hasta-talena āsphoṭayanti āṅga-jātaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7952: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī hasta-talenāṅgajātam āsphoṭayati pātreṇa vā ku-pātreṇa vā kaṃsikāya vā viḍallāya vā anyena vā puna kenacit tena ca kāma-rāgaṃ vinodayati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:7957: aparāya dāni bhikṣuṇīya kāma-rāgeṇa khajjantīya jatu-maṭṭhakaṃ mañcakaṃ yantritaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7960: tāya dāni saṃbhrān-tāya asamanvāharitvā sa mañcako bahin niṣkāsito |
K01n742u_001:7962: kahiṃ agnir utthito kasya gṛhād utthito |
K01n742u_001:7970: jatu-maṭṭhakaṃ nāma jatusya vā lohasya vā trapusya vā nāgrasya vā hāra-kūṭasya vā dantasya vā coḍakasya vā mṛttikāya vā aṅgajātakākāraṃ kṛtvā sve aṅgajāte praveśeti tena ca kāma -rāgaṃ vinodeti thul' accayam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:7976: atha khalu mahāprajāpatī gautamī yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramitvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāsi |
K01n742u_001:7984: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo bāhirabāhireṇa dhovanti tathaiva durgandhaṃ vāyati |
K01n742u_001:7985: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhagavantaṃ pṛcchati |
K01n742u_001:7989: bhikṣuṇīya dhovantīya ekam aṅguli-veṭhakaṃ praveśayitvā dhovitavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:7991: atidūraṃ praveśeti tena ca kāmarāgaṃ vinodeti thūl' accayam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:7996: tāsān dāni bhikṣuṇīnām anumāsaṃ anumāsaṃ ṛtur āgacchati |
K01n742u_001:7998: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhagavato āroceti |
K01n742u_001:8002: yasyā eṣa ṛtur āgacchati śoṇitaṃ sravati tayā ānīcolakaṃ dhārayitavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:8004: nāpi kṣamati gāḍhaṃ nāpi kṣamati atidūraṃ praveśayituṃ yathā tenaiva kāma-rāgam vinodayet |
K01n742u_001:8006: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī atidūram vā praveśeti gāḍham vā praveśeti yathā tenaiva kāma-rāgam vindodeti sthūl' accayam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:8011: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo strī-tīrthe ānīcolaṃ dhovanti |
K01n742u_001:8017: tena hi na kṣamati stri-tīrthe ānīcolakaṃ dhovituṃ |
K01n742u_001:8019: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī ānīcolakaṃ strī-tīrthe dhovati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:8026: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo puruṣa-tīrthe ānīcolakaṃ dhovanti |
K01n742u_001:8028: yāvat sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī ānīcolakaṃ puruṣa-tīrthe dhovati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:8035: tena hi na kṣamati rajaka-tīrthe dhovituṃ |
K01n742u_001:8036: atha khu kuṇḍālake vā kaṭāhake vā mallake vā dakānake vā udakaṃ gṛhya ekānte dhovitavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:8038: atha dāni bāhirodakaṃ bhavati yahiṃ nirvāho tahin dhovitavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:8039: tāni leṇṭakāni śoṣayitavyāni yadā puno ṛtu nāgacchati tadā puno dātavyāni |
K01n742u_001:8040: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī rajaka-tīrthe ānīcolaṃ dhovati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:8045: aparāya dāni bhikṣuṇīya rakta-cittāya aṅgajātaṃ udake dhāritaṃ |
K01n742u_001:8050: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī udaka-dhārāyām vā kuṇḍika-dhārāyām vā udakacoḍena vā āluka-veṇṭikāyām vā praṇālyām vā aṅgajātaṃ dhāreti tena ca kāma-rāgaṃ vinodeti thūl'-accayam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:8051: atha dāni snāyati taḍāge vā prasravaṇe vā praṇāliyam vā na dāni agrato udakadhārāṃ kṛtvā snāyitavyaṃ yathā pṛṣṭhīya vā śīrṣeṇa vā udaka-dhārāṃ praticcheya tathā snāyitavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:8052: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī agrato -mukhāṃ udaka-dhārāṃ kṛtvā snāyati tāya ca kāma-rāgaṃ vinodeti thūl'-accayam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:8057: aparāya dāni bhikṣuṇīya rakta-cittāya udaka-srote aṅgajātaṃ dhāritaṃ |
K01n742u_001:8058: tāye aśucir āgato yathā udaka-dhārāya yāvat |
K01n742u_001:8059: tena hi na kṣamati udaka-srote aṅgajātaṃ dhārayituṃ |
K01n742u_001:8061: yā dāni tāyo bhavanti giri-nadīyo śīghra-srotāyo tahiṃ aṅgajātaṃ dhāreti tena ca kāma-rāgaṃ vinodeti thūl' accyam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:8062: atha dāni snāyati na kṣamati agrato-mukhaṃ srotaṃ kṛtvā snāyituṃ pṛṣṭhato-mukhaṃ srotaṃ kṛtvā snāyitavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:8063: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī agrato-mukhaṃ srotaṃ kṛtvā snāyati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:8069: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo nānā-prakārehi mocayanti mūlakena palāṇḍū-kebukāye sobhañjanakena latikāya |
K01n742u_001:8072: tena hi na kṣamati vikṛtīhi mocayituṃ |
K01n742u_001:8074: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī mūlakena vā palāṇḍūya vā kebukāya vā sobhañjanakena vā latikāya vā illādukāya vā trapusena vā allābūya vā kakṣārukena vā anyena vā puna kenacin mocayati tena ca kāma-rāgaṃ vinodeti thūl' accayam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:8079: aparasya dāni bhikṣusya utkṣepanīyaṃ karma kriyate |
K01n742u_001:8083: kin nu khalu labhyā etaṃ kartuṃ utāho na labhyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:8088: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya bhikṣusya karma kartuṃ |
K01n742u_001:8089: karma-pratisaṃyuktaṃ na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya bhikṣusya karma kartuṃ (!) |
K01n742u_001:8090: atha dāni na kocit parikuśalo karma-kārako bhavati labhyaṃ bhikṣuṇīye bhikṣusya uddeśituṃ |
K01n742u_001:8091: atha dāni karma-karentasya vismarati labhyā bhikṣuṇīya anupradātuṃ |
K01n742u_001:8092: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣusya karma karoti vinayātikramaḥ |
K01n742u_001:8093: kiñcāpi bhikṣuḥ bhikṣuṇīye karma karoti an-āpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:8098: bhadrā dāni kāpileyī kauśeya-cīvareṇa prāvṛtā jñāti-kulaṃ gacchati sthūla-vṛṣito devo ovṛṣṭo kauśeya-cīvaramovṛṣṭaṃ kāyeśliṣṭaṃ sphaṭika-pratyuṣṭo viya kāyodṛśyati jano sannipātito bhadrāye aṅga-yaṣṭiṃ paśyitu-kāmo |
K01n742u_001:8099: sā dāni utkuṭukā upaviṣṭā antevāsinīhi parivṛtā |
K01n742u_001:8108: karttimaṃ prāvarati samvara-gāmī-vinayātikramaḥ kiñcāpi bhikṣur ubhayaṃ prāvarati an-āpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:8113: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī vihārasyākāśa-talake eka-saṃkakṣikāya caṃkramati |
K01n742u_001:8116: janena uccagghāyati paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇikā alābu-tumbakena viya nadīṃ taratīti |
K01n742u_001:8122: saṃkakṣikāye upariṭo osārayitavyo yathā gaṇḍā praticchannā bhaveṃsuḥ sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī gaṇḍa-praticchādanaṃ paṭaṃ na prāvarati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:8123: na dāni kṣamati prākaṭe pradeśe eka-saṃkakṣikāya āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:8124: na dāni kṣamati prākate pradeśe eka-saṃkakṣikāya caṃkramituṃ |
K01n742u_001:8125: atha dāni vihārasya gupte pradeśe caṃkramati [eka] saṃkakṣikāya anāpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:8132: yā dāni kumāriyo vuhyanti nava-vadhukāyo vā ānīyanti tāyo alaṃkarenti gṛheṇa gṛhan nīyanti |
K01n742u_001:8133: alaṃkarituṃ khajja-bhojjaṃ labhanti tena vṛttiṃ kalpenti |
K01n742u_001:8140: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī śīrṣam vā prasādheti akṣiṇī vā añjeti cūrṇakena vā mukhaṃ ocūrṇeti tena ca jīvikāṃ kalpeti vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:8141: atha dāni akṣiṇī-duḥkham ti śiro-vedanā vā bhavati |
K01n742u_001:8142: ardhāvabhedakā vā labhyā akṣiṇī añjayituṃ śīrṣam vā mārjayituṃ |
K01n742u_001:8147: tāyo dāni śākiya-kanyāyo kolita-kanyāyo malla-kanyāyo mahā-kula pravrajitāyo utpalāni vāpenti vikrīṇanti ca |
K01n742u_001:8153: tena hi na kṣamati utpalāni vāpayituṃ utpala-vāpakapratisamyuktaṃ |
K01n742u_001:8154: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī vāpeti vikrīṇāti ca tena ca jīvikāṃ kalpeti vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:8155: atha dāni caityārthāya vāpeti bhagavataḥ pūjā-karmāya vāpeti an-āpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:8160: evam eva sumanā-vāpanāya kartavyaṃ yāvat idam ucyate sumanā-vāpanā-pratisaṃyuktaṃ ||grā ||
K01n742u_001:8166: tāyo dāni śākiyakanyāyo kolita-kanyāyo malla-kanyāyo licchavikanyāyo utpalāni granthayitvā vikrīṇanti |
K01n742u_001:8173: tena hi na kṣamati utpalāni granthayituṃ |
K01n742u_001:8175: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī utpala-dāmām vāmallikā-dāmām vā āraṅgaṇa-dāmām vā kṛtvā vikrīṇanti |
K01n742u_001:8177: atha dāni mālyopahāro bhavati jātimahā vā bodhi-mahā vā dharma-cakra-mahā vā ānanda-mahā vā rāhula-mahā vā pañcavārṣikā vā |
K01n742u_001:8181: kiñcāpi bhikṣuṇī -m-utpala-mālām vā mallikā-mālām vā āraṅgaṇa-mālām vā granthayaty an-āpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:8185: evam eva sumanā-granthikāya nānā-karaṇaṃ granthi-guṇaṃ vā mālā-guṇam vā puṣpa-kañcukam vā kṛtvā vikrīṇāti |
K01n742u_001:8191: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo śākiya-kanyāyo yāvan mahā-kula-pravrajitāyo saṃjñikāḥ sūtraṃ kartayitvā vikrīṇanti |
K01n742u_001:8199: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī kambalam vā karpāsam vā kṣaumam vā kauśeyam vā śāṇam vā bhaṅgam vā anyam vā kartayitvā vikrīṇāti tena jīvikāṃ kalpayati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:8200: atha dāni bhikṣuṇīye cīvaraṃ pariśrāmaṇaṃ vā kṣīnaṃ vā bhavati labhyaṃ sī
K01n742u_001:8211: vayaṃ te rakṣiṣyāmaḥ sā dān āha gamiṣyāmi āryāye mūlaṃ āryā me rakṣiṣyati |
K01n742u_001:8212: tāhi tāye nūpurāṇi ābaddhāni karṇikā ābaddhā valayāni āviddhāni alaṃkṛtā rakṣoparaktehi vastrehi parihitā vāvāguṇṭhitā ca |
K01n742u_001:8214: so dāni manuṣyo tān dvāre sthitvā avaloketi |
K01n742u_001:8215: yāṃ velāṃ niṣkramiṣyati tato haṃ gṛhṇīṣyāmīti |
K01n742u_001:8219: sā dāni bhikṣuṇī upāśrayaṃ gatā bhikṣuṇīhi dṛṣṭā |
K01n742u_001:8223: nāhaṃ pratyodhāvitā api tu mama devaro pratyodhāvayitu-kāmo |
K01n742u_001:8229: evañ ca nāma tvaṃ ācāraṃ vikopayasi |
K01n742u_001:8230: tena hi na kṣamati ācāraṃ vikopayituṃ |
K01n742u_001:8231: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī tyakta-muktena [cittena] ācāraṃ vikopayati abhikṣuṇī bhavati |
K01n742u_001:8234: bhikṣur api a-tyakta-muktena cittena rakṣārthaṃ ācāraṃ vikopayati an-āpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:8240: sā dāni aparaṃ mahāntaṃ kulaṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭā |
K01n742u_001:8250: āryāya ahaṃ ettakaṃ caittakaṃ ca dāsye |
K01n742u_001:8256: yā prathamā bhikṣā lakṣati tāṃ bhikṣusya vā bhikṣuṇīye vā pratiṣṭhāye ti |
K01n742u_001:8264: tāya dāni bhītāya tharatharāpantīya pātraṃ praṇāmitaṃ |
K01n742u_001:8268: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ āyuṣmān mahā-kaśyapo bhikṣuṇām ārocayati |
K01n742u_001:8276: duṣkṛtan te nande naiṣa dharmo naiṣa vinayo yāvat |
K01n742u_001:8277: evañ ca nāma tvaṃ pātraṃ praticchādesi |
K01n742u_001:8278: tena hi na kṣamati pātraṃ praticchādayituṃ |
K01n742u_001:8280: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya prākaṭena pātre[ṇa] piṇḍāya aṭituṃ praticchādayitvā aṭitavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:8281: yadā bhikṣāṃ praticchati tadā ugghāṭiya praticchitavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:8282: yadi bhikṣuṃ rathyāyāṃ paśyati ugghāṭiya upadarśayitavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:8283: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī prākaṭena pātreṇa aṭati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:8284: bhikṣuṃ dṛṣṭvā na ugghāṭiya darśeti vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:8289: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo onaddha-varce varca-kuṭīye upaviśanti |
K01n742u_001:8293: te taṃ dārakaṃ ekāyāṃ bāhāyāṃ gṛhītvā ojjhāyanti |
K01n742u_001:8297: yāvat tena hi na kṣamati onaddha-varce upaviśituṃ |
K01n742u_001:8299: na dāni kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya onaddha-varca-kuṭiṃ kārāpayituṃ |
K01n742u_001:8303: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī onaddha-varca-kuṭīyaṃ āgatodakāyam vā upaviśati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:8308: tāya dāni bhikṣuṇīya śākiya-kanyāyo licchavi-kanyāyo malla-kanyāyo jentāke snāyanti |
K01n742u_001:8312: yāvat tena hi na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīye jentāke snāyituṃ |
K01n742u_001:8313: atha dāni gilānā bhavati labhyā vihāre svedayitvā tailena aṅgāni mrakṣayitvā snāyituṃ |
K01n742u_001:8314: sā esā bhikṣuṇī jentāke snāyati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:8319: tena kālena tena samayena bhikṣuṇīnām āraṅyakāni śayanāsanāni na pratikṣiptāni grāmāntikāni ca akṛtāni |
K01n742u_001:8320: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañca-mātrāṇi bhikṣuṇī-śatāni mahāprajāpatī-pramukhāni rājakārāme viharanti |
K01n742u_001:8321: tāyo dāni śākiya-kanyāyo licchavi-kanyāyo kolita-kanyāyo prāsādikāyo darśanīyāyo |
K01n742u_001:8327: tāyo puno madhyama-yāmaṃ evam paścimaṃ yāmaṃ prahāṇam upaviṣṭāḥ |
K01n742u_001:8330: yāhi ca middham anokrāntaṃ tāḥ sratti vaihāyasam abhyudgatāḥ |
K01n742u_001:8331: yāvanta samāpattikā yāhi ca middham avakrāntaṃ tāyo kula-putrakehi gṛhya viheṭhitāḥ |
K01n742u_001:8334: yāvat tena hi na kṣamati āraṇyake śayanāsane vastuṃ |
K01n742u_001:8335: atha dāni cātuṣpathikā sarva-rātrikā bhavati upāsakopāsikā gacchanti labhyaṃ vastuṃ |
K01n742u_001:8336: tahiṃ pi na kṣamati pratigupte pradeśe vastuṃ |
K01n742u_001:8337: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī āraṇyake śayanāsane vāsaṃ upagacchati varṣam vā vasati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:8341: 288. yo bhikṣūṇām āstāro an-āstāro so bhikṣuṇīnāṃ |
K01n742u_001:8342: [yo bhikṣuṇīnāṃ ] āstāro an-āstāro so bhikṣūṇāṃ || grā ||
K01n742u_001:8344: yo bhikṣūṇām uddhāro an-uddhāro so bhikṣuṇīnāṃ |
K01n742u_001:8346: yo bhikṣuṇīnām uddhāro an-uddhāro so bhikṣūṇāṃ || 0 ||
K01n742u_001:8348: yo bhikṣūṇām abhihāro an-abhihāro so bhikṣuṇīnāṃ ||ḻ ||
K01n742u_001:8349: yo bhikṣuṇīnām abhihāro an-abhihāro so bhikṣūnāṃ ||ḻ ||
K01n742u_001:8355: yaṃ bhikṣuṇīnām āmiṣaṃ akalpiyaṃ kalpiyaṃ tam bhikṣūṇāṃ ||2 ||
K01n742u_001:8357: labhyaṃ bhikṣusya bhikṣuṇīya pratigrahayituṃ sthāpayitvā jatarūpa-rajataṃ agni-kalpiyañ ca || 3 ||
K01n742u_001:8358: labhyaṃ bhikṣuṇīye bhikṣūṇā pratigrāhāpayituṃ sthāpayitvā jātarūpaṃ [rajataṃ] agni-kalpiyañ ca || ṇka ||
K01n742u_001:8367: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīnām eka-piṭake eke pi vicāre vastuṃ |
K01n742u_001:8369: yadāsya bhūyo bhikṣu liṅgaṃ prādurbhavati tadā bhikṣu-vihāram āgantavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:8370: sā evāsyopasampadā tad eva varṣāgraṃ || tṛ ||
K01n742u_001:8388: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī piṇḍacāram anvaṇṭī taṃhi praviṣṭā |
K01n742u_001:8391: imam ārye niṣkrāmetu yadi jīvantīyo mucciṣyāmo asmākaṃ bhaviṣyati āryāye vṛttiṃ dāsyāmo āryāye etaṃ bhaviṣyati |
K01n742u_001:8392: tāya tasyāḥ pātraṃ upanāmitaṃ imaṃhi dehīti |
K01n742u_001:8393: nānā-kārāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ pātraṃ pūrayitvā dinnaṃ muktāyāḥ maṇīnāṃ sphoṭikasya musāra-galvasya lohikāyāḥ |
K01n742u_001:8395: bhaṭehi ca dṛṣṭā te dān āhaṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:8400: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
K01n742u_001:8406: tena hi na kṣamati ratanaṃ praticchādayituṃ |
K01n742u_001:8408: etaṃ dāni mahāntaṃ kulaṃ rāja-kule nophatam bhavati yāvan na lekhyaṃ kṛtam bhavati |
K01n742u_001:8411: atha dāni lekhyaṃ kṛtam bhavati rakṣā vā kṛtā bhavati bhaṭehi parivāritam bhavati |
K01n742u_001:8413: imaṃ gṛhaṃ rāja-kulenopahataṃ yadi tāvaj jīvantīyo mucyāmaḥ asmākaṃ bhaviṣyati āryāyā eva bhaviṣyatīti na kṣamati niṣkāsayituṃ |
K01n742u_001:8415: bhagavatā śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ na kṣamati niṣkāsayituṃ |
K01n742u_001:8417: caityasya demaḥ saṃghasya vā demaḥ āryā[ye] eva demo ti gṛhṇītavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:8420: atha pṛcchīyati kasyedan ti caityasya saṃghasya mameti |
K01n742u_001:8423: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī ratana-pūrṇa-pātraṃ praticchādeti vinayātikramam āsādayati |
K01n742u_001:8428: nadīye ajirāvatīye pāre ubhayato sāṃghikaṃ bhaktaṃ |
K01n742u_001:8434: na kṣamati bhikṣusya bhikṣuṇīya saha eka-nāvām abhiruhituṃ ti |
K01n742u_001:8436: eka-bhikṣuṇāpi nāvā paliguddhā bhavati dvihi trihi evaṃ paliguddhā bhavati |
K01n742u_001:8437: yadā te bhikṣū uttaritāḥ tadā bhikṣuṇīyo eka-nāvā-paripūrakena tāritāḥ |
K01n742u_001:8439: atha kho mahāprajāpatī gautamī sāyāhna-samaye parikilantehi mahā-bhūtehi bhagavato pādavandīkāṃ upasaṃkrāntā |
K01n742u_001:8442: atha mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhagavato tad eva sarvam āroceti |
K01n742u_001:8444: tena hi aṣṭāhi bhikṣuṇīhi yathā-vṛddhikāya upaveṣṭavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:8446: ete dāni bhavanti bhaktā vā tarpaṇā vā yavāgupānā vā paraṃ vārṣikā vā mahāpañca-vārṣikā vā aṣṭānāṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ āsanāni sthāpayitavyāni yathā-vṛddhikāya
K01n742u_001:8447: aṣṭa vā nirmuṣṭikā hastāḥ pratikṛty' eva gantavyaṃ |
K01n742u_001:8448: tā etā bhikṣuṇīyo aṣṭānām āsanāni sthāpayitvā niṣīdanti vinayātikramam āsādayanti |
K01n742u_001:8450: aṣṭābhir bhikṣuṇībhir yathā-vṛddhikāya upaveṣṭavyam u śiṣṭābhi yathāgatikāya || 0 ||
K01n742u_001:8463: sarve anye nava padā anūnā pratiṣitavyā puna tahiṃ |
K01n742u_001:8468: yatrāsi yānaṃ phala-vikṛtiṃ nirdiśet tahiṃ vijñaḥ |
K01n742u_001:8469: yatrāsi saha-niṣadyā ekorttakaṃ tahiṃ samādiśet chatraṃ |
K01n742u_001:8471: yatrāsi śastra-karma nirdiśet tahiṃ and āpattiḥ |
K01n742u_001:8472: yatrāsi viśoka-darśanaṃ āpatti-pratikarma tatra nirdiśed vijñaḥ |
K01n742u_001:8473: etāvatā uddhārāḥ prakīrṇake ye ca ovṛṣāḥ vargaṃ sam-uddhariya dvādaśamaṃ |
K01n742u_001:8474: nava padāni punar eva bhikṣuṇīnāṃ prakīrṇake sarvaṃ pratikṣiptaṃ bhikṣu-prakīrṇakato vargās trayodaśa kāryāḥ |
K01n742u_001:8475: anye ca pañca vargāyutakā yathā bhikṣuṇī-sūtre |
K01n742u_001:8477: jentākaṃ varca kaṭhinaṃ uddharitvā avaśeṣā tathaiva kāryāḥ |
K01n742u_001:8479: taṃ sarvaṃ saṅkale puna vargā aṣṭādaśa prakīrṇake svayaṃbhunā nirdiṣṭā |
K01n742u_001:8481: pañca-śatāni anūnāni apare ca padā catustriṃśat |
K01n742u_001:8664: 'phag-spa dge-'dun-phal-chen -pai 'jig rten-las -'das-par-smra-bai dge- sloṅ-gi 'dul-ba sil-bu rdzogs-so ||
